text:
â–Eng koâ€™p yoâ€™l qoâ€™yiladigan 5 ta grammatik xatoâ–

Eng koâ€™p yoâ€™l qoâ€™yiladigan xatolarni oâ€™rganib chiqish orqali ingliz tilida yozishingizni yaxshilab olishingiz mumkin. Bu xatolarni tushunish, ularning asosini anglab yetish orqali oâ€™zingiz yozgan matnlarni tekshirishda koâ€™p xatolarning oldini olishingiz mumkin.

1-XATO: BOSHLANGâ€™ICH FIKR. Boshlangâ€™ich fikr â€“ bu ikkita gapdan iborat boâ€™lgan qoâ€™shma gap mazmunini bitta gapga jamlash va shu bilan bir qatorda ularni bogâ€™lovchisiz, tinish belgilarisiz uygâ€™unlashtirish demakdir. Boshlangâ€™ich fikr oâ€™zidan keyin keladigan qoâ€™shma gap mazmunini toâ€™liq yoki umumiy jihatdan qisman ifoda eta olishi kerak. Boshlangâ€™ich fikr va undan keyin keladigan qoâ€™shma gap uygâ€™unlashuvini besh xil usulda amalga oshirish mumkin:

â–ªï¸ Boshlangâ€™ich fikr va qoâ€™shma gaplarni ikkita alohida-alohida gaplarga boâ€™lish;
â–ªï¸ Vergulni nuqtali vergul bilan almashtirish;
â–ªï¸ Vergulni biror mos bogâ€™lovchi bilan almashtirish (masalan: and, but, for, yet, or, so);
â–ªï¸ Vergulni biror mos bogâ€™lovchi soâ€™z bilan almashtirish (masalan: after, although, before, unless, as, because, even though, if, since, until, when, while)
â–ªï¸ Vegulni nuqtali vergul va oâ€™tish soâ€™z-bogâ€™lovchisi bilan almashtirish (masalan: however, moreover, on the other hand, nevertheless, instead, also, therefore, consequently, otherwise, as a result).

Masalan:
âŒ Xato: Rachel is very smart, she began reading when she was three years old.
âœ… Toâ€™gâ€™ri: Rachel is very smart. She began reading when she was three years old.
âœ… Toâ€™gâ€™ri: Rachel is very smart; she began reading when she was three years old.
âœ… Toâ€™gâ€™ri: Rachel is very smart, and she began reading when she was three years old.
âœ… Toâ€™gâ€™ri: Because Rachel is very smart, she began reading when she was three years old.
âœ… Toâ€™gâ€™ri: Rachel is very smart; as a result, she began reading when she was three years old.

2-XATO: OLMOSH. Olmoshdagi xatolik olmosh koâ€™ratayotgan ega (ot)ga mos kelmaganda sodir boâ€™ladi. Agar ega koâ€™plikda boâ€™lsa, unga ishora qiluvchi olmosh ham koâ€™plida boâ€™lishi kerak. Ammo ega birlikda boâ€™lsa, demak, unga ishora beruvchi olmosh ham birlik shaklida boâ€™lishi kerak. 
Misolga eâ€™tibor bering:

âŒ Xato: Everybody must bring their own lunch.
âœ… Toâ€™gâ€™ri: Everybody must bring his or her own lunch.

Juda koâ€™p sonli kitoblarda yuqoridagi misollarda berilgan ega va olmosh moslashuvi Â«Everybody â€“ theirÂ» koâ€™rinishida berilgan. Bu uslub yozuvchilarning Â«EverybodyÂ»ga nisbatan olmosh tanlashda xatolikka yoâ€™l qoâ€™ymasliklarining kafolati sifatida joriy etilgan boâ€™lsa ham, grammatik jihatdan xato hisoblanadi. Doim Â«he or sheÂ» usulida olmosh keltirishimiz kerak. Shunday qilsak, grammatik jihatdan toâ€™gâ€™ri boâ€™ladi.

3-XATO: APOSTROF ISHLATILISHI. Oâ€™zbek tilidagi Â«-ningÂ» qoâ€™shimchasi sifatida tarjima qilinib, egalikni bildiruvchi apostrof (tutuq belgisi)ning gaplarda toâ€™gâ€™ri ishlatilishi muhim ahamiyatga ega. Birgina shu belgi koâ€™p katta maâ€™no oâ€™zgarishlariga olib kelishi mumkin.
â–ªï¸ Apostrof belgisi egalik olmoshlaridan keyin ishlatilmaydi. 
Masalan:
âŒ Xato: My mothers cabin is next to hisâ€™ cabin.
âœ… Toâ€™gâ€™ri: My motherâ€™s cabin is next to his cabin.

â–ªï¸ Bundan tashqari apostrofning ishlatilishi Â«it isÂ» va Â«itsÂ» oâ€™rtasidagi tafovvutni ham aniqlab berishi mumkin. Masalan:

âŒ Xato: Its a cold day in October.
âœ… Toâ€™gâ€™ri: Itâ€™s a cold day in October.

4-XATO: EGA VA FEâ€™LNING MOS EMASLIGI. Har doim ega va feâ€™l mos kelishi kerak. Turli zamonlardagi gaplarning yasalishida ega va feâ€™lning turli holatlarda qanday moslashishini koâ€™rib oâ€™tganmiz. Shundan kelib chiqqan holda quyidagi misollarga eâ€™tibor bering:

âŒ Xato: The recipes is good for beginning chefs.
âœ… Toâ€™gâ€™ri: The recipes are good for beginning chefs.

1ï¸âƒ£ much - koÊ»p soÊ»zi sanalmaydigan otlar oldidan inkor va soÊ»roq gaplarda qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸Do you get much rain here? (Bu yerda koÊ»p yomg'ir yog'adimi?)
ğŸ”¸She didn't get much money for her car. (U mashinasi uchun koÊ»p pul olmadi)

âœ³ï¸ much soÊ»zi rasmiy va badiiy uslubda darak gaplarda ham qoÊ»llanadi.
ğŸ”¸Much was said but little was done.
ğŸ”¸There is much enthusiasm for the idea.

âœ³ï¸ how much - qancha soÊ»roq olmoshi boÊ»lib, sanalmaydigan  otlar oldidan qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸How much bread did you buy?

âœ³ï¸ much soÊ»zi kuchaytirish va qiyoslash ma'nosini beruvchi too/as/so soÊ»zlaridan keyin kelib, darak  gaplarda qoÊ»llanadi.
ğŸ”¸I've got too/so much work to do. (Mening bajaradigan ishim juda koÊ»p)
ğŸ”¸Your car costs as much as mine.

2ï¸âƒ£ many - koÊ»p soÊ»zi sanaladigan koÊ»plikdagi otlar oldidan inkor va soÊ»roq gaplarda qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸Does he have many friends here? (Bu yerda uning koÊ»p doÊ»stlari bormi?)
ğŸ”¸We don't get many storms here. (Bu yerda koÊ»p boÊ»ron boÊ»lmaydi)

âœ³ï¸ many soÊ»zi rasmiy va badiiy uslubda darak gaplarda ham qoÊ»llanadi.
ğŸ”¸Many students have financial problems.

âœ³ï¸ how many - qancha soÊ»roq olmoshi sanaladigan koÊ»plikdagi otlar oldidan kelib, miqdorni bildirib keladi.
ğŸ”¸How many eggs do we need? (Bizga qancha tuxum kerak?)

âœ³ï¸ many soÊ»zi kuchaytirish va qiyoslash ma'nosini beruvchi too/so/as  soÊ»zlaridan keyin kelib darak gaplarda qoÊ»llanadi.
ğŸ”¸You have made too many mistakes in your dictation. (Siz diktantingizda juda koÊ»p xato qilgansiz)
ğŸ”¸Bill has got as many cars as Cecilia.

3ï¸âƒ£ a lot of/lots of - koÊ»p soÊ»zi sanaladigan koÊ»plikdagi va sanalmaydigan otlar oldidan darak  gaplarda qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸We get a lot of storms here. (Bu yerda juda koÊ»p boÊ»ronlar boÊ»ladi)
ğŸ”¸We get a lot of rain here. (Bu yerda juda koÊ»p yomg'ir boÊ»ladi)

âœ³ï¸ much/many/a lot soÊ»zlari otsiz qoÊ»llanishlari  mumkin. Bunday vaziyatda ular oldin ishlatilgan otga ishora qiladilar.
ğŸ”¸I take photos, but not as I used to. At one time I took a lot. (=a lot of photos)
ğŸ”¸They asked me for some money but I myself haven't got much. (=much money)
ğŸ”¸They have caught some fish but not many. (=many fish)

âš ï¸ Yuqoridagi soÊ»zlarni qoÊ»llashda asosiy e'tibor beriladigan jihati bu gapning turi va otning  sanaladigan va sanalmaydigan ekanligini aniqlab olishdir.

âœ³ï¸ a lot  - koÊ»p, tez-tez ma'nosida darak gaplarda, much esa inkor va soÊ»roq gaplarda ravish boÊ»lib kelishi mumkin.
ğŸ”¸She had to study a lot to catch up with the rest. (...koÊ»p oÊ»qishiga toÊ»g'ri keldi)
ğŸ”¸They don't go out much. (Ular tez-tez koÊ»chaga chiqmaydilar)
ğŸ”¸We didn't enjoy the film much.

ğŸ”¸I've got too/so much work to do. (Mening bajaradigan ishim juda koÊ»p)
ğŸ”¸Your car costs as much as mine.

2ï¸âƒ£ many - koÊ»p soÊ»zi sanaladigan koÊ»plikdagi otlar oldidan inkor va soÊ»roq gaplarda qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸Does he have many friends here? (Bu yerda uning koÊ»p doÊ»stlari bormi?)
ğŸ”¸We don't get many storms here. (Bu yerda koÊ»p boÊ»ron boÊ»lmaydi)

âœ³ï¸ many soÊ»zi rasmiy va badiiy uslubda darak gaplarda ham qoÊ»llanadi.
ğŸ”¸Many students have financial problems.

âœ³ï¸ how many - qancha soÊ»roq olmoshi sanaladigan koÊ»plikdagi otlar oldidan kelib, miqdorni bildirib keladi.
ğŸ”¸How many eggs do we need? (Bizga qancha tuxum kerak?)

âœ³ï¸ many soÊ»zi kuchaytirish va qiyoslash ma'nosini beruvchi too/so/as  soÊ»zlaridan keyin kelib darak gaplarda qoÊ»llanadi.
ğŸ”¸You have made too many mistakes in your dictation. (Siz diktantingizda juda koÊ»p xato qilgansiz)
ğŸ”¸Bill has got as many cars as Cecilia.

3ï¸âƒ£ a lot of/lots of - koÊ»p soÊ»zi sanaladigan koÊ»plikdagi va sanalmaydigan otlar oldidan darak  gaplarda qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸We get a lot of storms here. (Bu yerda juda koÊ»p boÊ»ronlar boÊ»ladi)
ğŸ”¸We get a lot of rain here. (Bu yerda juda koÊ»p yomg'ir boÊ»ladi)

âœ³ï¸ much/many/a lot soÊ»zlari otsiz qoÊ»llanishlari  mumkin. Bunday vaziyatda ular oldin ishlatilgan otga ishora qiladilar.
ğŸ”¸I take photos, but not as I used to. At one time I took a lot. (=a lot of photos)
ğŸ”¸They asked me for some money but I myself haven't got much. (=much money)
ğŸ”¸They have caught some fish but not many. (=many fish)

âš ï¸ Yuqoridagi soÊ»zlarni qoÊ»llashda asosiy e'tibor beriladigan jihati bu gapning turi va otning  sanaladigan va sanalmaydigan ekanligini aniqlab olishdir.

âœ³ï¸ a lot  - koÊ»p, tez-tez ma'nosida darak gaplarda, much esa inkor va soÊ»roq gaplarda ravish boÊ»lib kelishi mumkin.
ğŸ”¸She had to study a lot to catch up with the rest. (...koÊ»p oÊ»qishiga toÊ»g'ri keldi)
ğŸ”¸They don't go out much. (Ular tez-tez koÊ»chaga chiqmaydilar)
ğŸ”¸We didn't enjoy the film much.

text.text:
ğŸ”˜1. Do you follow me? - Siz meni eshityapsizmi?

ğŸ”˜2. Are you with me? - Meni eshityapsizmi (chalgÊ»imadingizmi?)

ğŸ”˜3. Do you want to leave a message? - Xabar qoldirmoqchimisiz?

ğŸ”˜4. Can I take a message? - Nima deb qoÊ»yay?

ğŸ”˜5. IÊ»ll call you right back - Men sizga hozir qayta qoÊ»ngÊ»iroq qilib yuboraman

ğŸ”˜6. ThereÊ»s a telephone call for you - Sizni telefonga soÊ»rashyapti

ğŸ”˜7. DonÊ»t talk so fast - Bunaqa tez gapirmang

ğŸ”˜8. May I use your telephone? - Telefoningizdan qoÊ»ngÊ»iroq qilib olsam boÊ»ladimi?

ğŸ”˜9. Please, dial again - Iltimos, raqamni qayta terib yuboring

ğŸ”˜10. Can you speak a bit louder? I canÊ»t hear you - Qattiqroq gapira olasizmi? Men sizni eshitmayapman

ğŸ”˜11. IÊ»ll get it - Men go'shakni olaman

ğŸ”˜12. You have the wrong number - Raqamda adashdingiz (Boshqa joyga tushdingiz)

ğŸ”˜13. What number are you calling? - Siz qaysi raqamga qoÊ»ngÊ»iroq qilayapsiz?

ğŸ”˜14. What number did you dial? - Qaysi nomerni teryapsiz?

ğŸ”˜15. WhatÊ»s your extension? - QoÊ»shimcha nomeringiz qaysi?

ğŸ”˜16. Please pick up the receiver - Iltimos, go'shakni oling

ğŸ”˜17. IÊ»m calling from a pay phone - Men avtomatdan qoÊ»ngÊ»iroq qilyapman

ğŸ”˜18. They hung up - Kimdir trubkani qoÊ»yib qoÊ»ydi

ğŸ”˜19. The telephone is out of order - Telefon ishlamayapti

ğŸ”˜20. My number is... - Mening raqamim...

ğŸ”˜21. IÊ»m returning your phone call - Meni sizning qoÊ»ngÊ»irogÊ»ingizga javoban telefon qilyapman

ğŸ”˜22. Please call back later - Iltimos, keyinroq qaytarib telefon qilib yuboring

ğŸ”˜23. YouÊ»ve got the wrong number - Siz boshqa joyga tushdingiz
ğŸ”˜ Join and share with your friends! ğŸ‘‡ğŸ»

text.text:
Ingliz tilini qo'shiqlarda o'rganing
ğŸ”˜ Billie Eilish â€” ilomilo

text:
Told you not to worry
But maybe that's a lie
Honey, what's your hurry?
Won't you stay inside?
Remember not to get too close to stars
They're never gonna give you love like ours

Where did you go?
I should know, but it's cold
And I don't wanna be lonely
So show me the way home
I can't lose another life

Hurry, I'm worried

The world's a little blurry
Or maybe it's my eyes
The friends I've had to bury
They keep me up at night
Said I couldn't love someone
'Cause I might break
If you're gonna die, not by mistake

So, where did you go?
I should know, but it's cold
And I don't wanna be lonely
So tell me you'll come home
Even if it's just a lie

I tried not to upset you
Let you rescue me the day I met you
I just wanted to protect you
But now I'll never get to

Hurry, I'm worried

Where did you go?
I should know, but it's cold
And I don't wanna be lonely
Was hoping you'd come home
I don't care if it's a lie

ğŸ’®

text.text: few (a few) va little (a little) so'zlarining qo'llanishi

text:
1ï¸âƒ£ few - oz, kam degan ma'noda sanaladigan koÊ»plikdagi otlar oldidan salbiy (yetarli emas) degan ma'noda qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸Being a newcomer, the boy had few friends there. (Yangi kelgani uchun bolaning bu yerda doÊ»stlari kam edi)
ğŸ”¸Few customers came into the shop. It was quiet. (DoÊ»konga kam xaridor kirardi. U sokin edi)

âœ³ï¸ a few - bir qancha degan ma'noda sanaladigan koÊ»plikdagi otlar oldidan ijobiy (yetarlicha) ma'noda qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸He enjoyed his life. He had a few friends and they met quite often. (U oÊ»zining hayotidan zavqlanardi. Uning yetarlicha doÊ»stlari bor edi va ular tez-tez uchrashishardi)
ğŸ”¸A few customers have come into the shop. It has been fairly busy. (DoÊ»konga bir necha xaridorlar keldilar. U biroz qizg'in)

2ï¸âƒ£ little - oz, kam degan ma'noda sanalmaydigan otlar oldidan salbiy (yetarli emas)  ma'noda qoÊ»llanadi.
ğŸ”¸Hurry up!  We have got little time. (Shoshiling! Bizning vaqtimiz oz)
ğŸ”¸Vicky has made little progress and so is not feeling pleased.

âœ³ï¸ a little - biroz degan ma'noda sanalmaydigan otlar oldidan ijobiy (yetarlicha) ma'noda qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸We had a little time and went for a drink. (Bizning yetarlicha vaqtimiz bor edi va biz ichimlik ichishga ketdik)
ğŸ”¸She is not hungry. She has just had a little soup.

âœ³ï¸ a little/little soÊ»zlari gapda ravish boÊ»lib ham kelishlari mumkin.
ğŸ”¸I was a little annoyed. (Men biroz achchiqlangan edim)
ğŸ”¸She knows little about it. (U bu haqda kam biladi)

âœ³ï¸ very few/ very little va so few/so little - juda oz, juda kam iboralari ham salbiy (yetarli emas) ma'noda qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸We couldn't do all the work. We had very little time. (Biz hamma ishni qilolmadik. Bizning vaqtimiz juda kam edi)
ğŸ”¸She had very few customers, so she had to close the shop.(Uning xaridorlari juda kam edi, shuning uchun u do'konni yopishga majbur bo'ldi)

âœ³ï¸ Agar a few, a little soÊ»zlari oldidan only soÊ»zi qatnashsa, ularning ma'nolarini yana salbiy qiladi.  
â–ªï¸only a few = few   
â–ªï¸only a little= little
ğŸ”¸London only gets a little snow in winter. (Qishda Londonda kam qor yog'adi)
ğŸ”¸Only a few students were able to pass the exam. (=few students)
ğŸ”¸She didn't say much, only a few words. (=few words)

âœ³ï¸ few/little soÊ»zlarini qoÊ»llashdan oldin otlarning sanaladigan  va sanalmaydiganligi va gapda salbiy yoki ijobiy ma'noda kelayotganini aniqlash lozim.
âœ… few (only a few) - sanaladigan koÊ»plikdagi otlar (salbiy)      
âœ… little (only a little) - sanalmaydigan otlar  (salbiy )
âœ… a few - sanaladigan koÊ»plikdagi otlar (ijobiy)
âœ… a little - sanalmaydigan otlar ( ijobiy )

text:
Kina - Get You the Moon

[Verse]
You gave me a shoulder when I needed it
You showed me love when I wasn't feeling it
You helped me fight when I was giving in
And you made me laugh when I was losing it

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause you are, you are
The reason why I'm still hanging on
'Cause you are, you are
The reason why my head is still above water

[Chorus]
And if I could, I'd get you the moon
And give it to you
And if death was coming for you
I'd give my life for you

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause you are, you are
The reason why I'm still hanging on
'Cause you are, you are
The reason why my head is still above water

[Chorus]
And if I could, I'd get you the moon
And give it to you
And if death was coming for you
I'd give my life for you

[Bridge]
'Cause you are, you are
Oh, you are
Oh, you are
You are

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause you are, you are
The reason why I'm still hanging on
'Cause you are, you are
The reason why my head is still above water

[Chorus]
And if I could, I'd get you the moon
And give it to you
And if death was coming for you
I'd give my life for you

text.text:
ğŸ’¥ Uylanganmisiz? - Are you married?

ğŸ’¥ Qachon uylangansiz (turmushga chiqqansiz)? - When were you married?

ğŸ’¥ Oilangiz kattami? - Is your family large?

ğŸ’¥ Oilangiz kichikmi? - Is your family small?

ğŸ’¥ Oilam katta - I have a large family.

ğŸ’¥ Bu birinchi uylanishingizmi? - Is it your first marriage?

ğŸ’¥ Qancha vaqtingizni oilangiz bilan o'tkazasiz? - How much time do you spend with your family?

ğŸ’¥ Oilangiz shu yerdami? - Is your family here?

ğŸ’¥ Bolalaringiz bormi? - Do you have children?

ğŸ’¥ Ikki farzandim bor - I have two children

ğŸ’¥ bir qiz va bir o'g'il. - a daughter and a son.

ğŸ’¥ Yo'q. Farzandim yo'q. - No, I don't have (children).

ğŸ’¥ Men oilamni sevaman - I love my family.

ğŸ”¸You can go to either restaurant. (Ikkalasidan xohlagan biriga borishingiz mumkin...birlikdagi ot)
ğŸ”¸Neither restaurant was expensive. (Ikkala restoran ham qimmat emas edi....birlikdagi ot va fe'l )

âœ³ï¸ Bu olmoshlar savollarga javob sifatida qoÊ»llanishiga e'tibor bering.
ğŸ”¸I see you have two books, which book can you give me? (Men koÊ»ryapmank,i sizda ikkita kitob bor. Men qaysisini oÊ»qishim kerak?)
â–Both. I have already read them. (Ikkalasini ham. Men ularni allaqachon oÊ»qiganman.)
â–Either.  (unisi yoki bunisini, lekin birini)
ğŸ”¸Is he British or American? (U britaniyalikmi yoki amerikalikmi?) 
â–Neither. He is Italian. (Ikkalasi ham emas. U italiyalik.)

âœ³ï¸Bu olmoshlar both/either/ neither of +(my / the / these ) + noun qurilmasida ham qoÊ»llaniladi. Bunday vaziyatlarda  ularning qoÊ»llanishi  quyidagicha boÊ»ladi.
ğŸ”¸Both of these books are written by A. Christie.
ğŸ”¸I didn't like either of the films.
ğŸ”¸Neither of my brothers is/are married.

âš ï¸ Yuqoridagi ikkinchi misolda either soÊ»zi inkor gaplarda 'ikkalasi ham emas' degan ma'noni bildiradi. Inkor gaplarda both soÊ»zini qoÊ»llab boÊ»lmaydi. 

ğŸ’¡ Yuqoridagilardan xulosa qilamizki, both olmoshi har doim koÊ»plikdagi fe'l bilan darak gaplarda, either boÊ»lishsiz fe'l bilan inkor gaplarda, neither boÊ»lishli fe'l bilan lekin inkor ma'no  ifodalab qatnashadi.

âœ³ï¸ Bu olmoshlar bog'lovchi sifatida ham qoÊ»llanishi mumkin, unda ular quyidagicha juftlanadi.

1ï¸âƒ£ both â€¦ and  - ham  â€¦ ham
ğŸ”¸Both European and oriental languages are taught at London University.
2ï¸âƒ£either â€¦ or  - yo  â€¦ yo
ğŸ”¸Either you apologize or I will never  forgive you.
3ï¸âƒ£ neither ... nor - na â€¦ na
ğŸ”¸Neither Tom nor Ann wants to leave school.

âš ï¸ either â€¦ or va neither â€¦ nor bog'lovchilari gap egalarini  bog'lab kelganida fe'l ikkinchi, ya'ni fe'lga yaqin turgan ega bilan  moslashadi.
ğŸ”¸Either Tom or his friends are coming to the party .
ğŸ”¸Neither the Wilsons nor I am happy about the new billing system.

âœ³ï¸ either soÊ»zi ikki tomonli predmetlar uchun qoÊ»llanilganda  har ikki tarafda/ikkala tarafda ham degan ma'noda qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸There were a lot of trees on either side of the road. (YoÊ»lning ikkala tarafidan ham koÊ»p daraxtlar bor edi)

text.text:
ğŸ¼ Everything I wanted
ğŸ¤ Billie Eilish 

â€‹â€‹I had a dream
I got everything I wanted
Not what you'd think
And if I'm being honest

It might've been a nightmare
To anyone who might care
Thought I could fly (fly)
So I stepped off the golden, mm
Nobody cried (cried, cried, cried, cried)
Nobody even noticed
I saw them standing right there
Kinda thought they might care (might care, might care)

I had a dream
I got everything I wanted
But when I wake up, I see
You with me

And you say, "As long as I'm here
No one can hurt you
Don't wanna lie here
But you can learn to
If I could change
The way that you see yourself
You wouldn't wonder why you're here
They don't deserve you"

I tried to scream
But my head was underwater
They called me weak
Like I'm not just somebody's daughter

It could've been a nightmare
But it felt like they were right there
And it feels like yesterday was a year ago
But I don't wanna let anybody know
'Cause everybody wants something from me now
And I don't wanna let 'em down

I had a dream
I got everything I wanted
But when I wake up, I see
You with me

And you say, "As long as I'm here
No one can hurt you
Don't wanna lie here
But you can learn to
If I could change
The way that you see yourself
You wouldn't wonder why you're here
They don't deserve you"

If I knew it all then would I do it again?
Would I do it again?
If they knew what they said would go straight to my head
What would they say instead?
If I knew it all then would I do it again?
Would I do it again?
If they knew what they said would go straight to my head
What would they say instead?

Tonight

messages.text:
one so'zining qo'llanishi

âœ³ï¸ one olmoshi ingliz tilida otlarni oÊ»zini qayta takrorlamaslik uchun qoÊ»llaniladi. Sanaladigan otlar uchun birlikda one, koÊ»plikda  ones shaklida qoÊ»llaniladi. O'zbek tiliga mazkur so'z birlikda -si, ko'plikda -lari qo'shimchasi sifatida ishlatiladi.
ğŸ”¸Don't use that cloth. Use this clean one. (Anavi matoni ishlatma. Mana bu yangisini ishlat)
ğŸ”¸I don't want to wear my old shoes. I want to wear my new ones. (Men eski oyoq kiyimlarimni kiyishni xohlamayman. Men yangilarini kiyishni xohlayman)
ğŸ”¸Can I take this book ? No, take that one. (that one=that book)

âœ³ï¸ this/that/these/those/each/another/which olmoshlari yoki orttirma darajadagi sifatdan  keyin ones/one soÊ»zlari tushib qolishi mumkin.
ğŸ”¸I don't like these sweaters. I prefer those over there. (=those ones)
ğŸ”¸I tried all these numbers, and each was engaged. (=each one)
ğŸ”¸The last  question is the most difficult. (=the most difficult one)

âœ³ï¸ Ammo one/ones soÊ»zlarini the/every yoki oddiy  darajadagi sifatlardan keyin ishlatilishi shart.
ğŸ”¸The film wasn't as good as the one we saw last week.
ğŸ”¸I rang all the numbers but every one was engaged. (every one = har biri)

âš ï¸ everyone va every one soÊ»zlarini farqlay bilish lozim. everyone â€“ hamma, barcha degan maâ€™nolarda faqat insonlar uchun qoÊ»llaniladi. 
ğŸ”¸Everyone is ready to begin the test.
every one â€“ har biri(si)  degan maâ€™noda narsalar va insonlar uchun ham qoÊ»llaniladi va of bilan birikmalarda kela oladi.
ğŸ”¸Jack is invited to a lot of parties and he goes to every one.
ğŸ”¸I have read every one of these books. (Men bu kitoblarning har birini o'qib chiqqanman)

âœ³ï¸ one olmoshini yolg'iz oÊ»zini noaniq artikl bilan qoÊ»llab boÊ»lmaydi, uning oldida sifat boÊ»lishi  yoki hech qanday soÊ»z boÊ»lmasligi  lozim.
ğŸ”¸I have been looking for a coat, but I can't find a nice one.
ğŸ”¸I have been looking  for a coat, but  I can't find one.

âœ³ï¸ one olmoshi ega oÊ»rnida kelib rasmiy uslubda  odamlarga nisbatan qoÊ»llanishi  mumkin. OÊ»zbek tilida shaxsi noma'lum gaplar sifatida tarjima qilinadi.
ğŸ”¸One cannot have 30 eggs for breakfast. (Nonushtaga 30 ta tuxum yeb boÊ»lmaydi)
ğŸ”¸One mustn't be late for the lesson. (Darsga kech qolmaslik kerak.)
ğŸ”¸One shouldn't believe what one reads in the newspapers. (Gazetada oÊ»qiydigan hamma narsalarga ishonavermaslik kerak)

âœ³ï¸ one+payt so'zi â€“ noaniqlikni bildirish uchun oÊ»tgan yoki kelasi zamonlarda ishlatilishi mumkin.
ğŸ”¸One day Robin Hood met a poor peasant.
ğŸ”¸One day I hope to see flying cars.

messages.text:
this/that/these/those kabi ko'rsatish olmoshlarining qo'llanishi

1ï¸âƒ£ this + birlikdagi ot va these + koÊ»plikdagi ot qurilmasida koÊ»rsatish olmoshlari bu, mana shu degan ma'noda yonginamizda, yaqinda turgan shaxs  yoki predmetlarni koÊ»rsatish uchun qoÊ»llanadi.
ğŸ”¸This book is mine. (Bu kitob meniki)
ğŸ”¸These books are mine. (Bu kitoblar meniki)

2ï¸âƒ£ that+birlikdagi ot va those+ koÊ»plikdagi ot qurilmasida koÊ»rsatish olmoshlari u/anavi degan ma'noda  uzoqroqda, yaqinimizda boÊ»lmagan shaxs yoki predmetlarni koÊ»rsatish  uchun qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸A: That table is nice, isn't it? (Anavi stol yaxshi, shunday emasmi?) 
â–B: But I don't like those chairs. (Lekin menga anavi kursilar yoqmayapti.)

âœ³ï¸ this/that olmoshlari sanalmaydigan otlar bilan ham qoÊ»llanadi.
ğŸ”¸The taste of this soup is bad.
ğŸ”¸That water is very cold.

âœ³ï¸ this olmoshi insonlarni tanishtirishda, that olmoshi insonlarni koÊ»rsatishda qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸James, this is my friend Rita.         
ğŸ”¸That's Andrew over there.

âœ³ï¸ Telefon suhbatida ham this/that olmoshlari qoÊ»llanishi mumkin.
ğŸ”¸Hello. This is Laura speaking.
ğŸ”¸WhoÊ»s this/that, please?

ğŸ”¸that/those olmoshlari oldin tilga olingan otlarni qayta takrorlamaslik uchun qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸The salary of teachers are higher than that of doctors. (OÊ»qituvchilarning maoshi doktorlarnikiga qaraganda balandroq)
ğŸ”¸The stories written by OÊ»Henry are as full of life as those written by M.Twain.
âœ… Birinchi gapda that of so'zi salary so'zini, ikkinchi gapda those so'zi the stories so'zini qayta takrorlamaslik uchun ishlatilmoqda.

ğŸ’¡ Bu soÊ»zlar bilan keladigan odatiy iboralar:
âœ… that's right/that's it - toÊ»gri
âœ… that will do - toÊ»g'ri keladi, boÊ»ladi, yetadi
âœ… that won't do -  toÊ»g'ri kelmaydi, boÊ»lmaydi, yetmaydi

text.text:
ğŸ¼ Bury A Friend 
ğŸ¤ Billie Eilish 

What do you want from me? Why don't you run from me?
What are you wondering? What do you know?
Why aren't you scared of me? Why do you care for me?
When we all fall asleep, where do we go?

(Come here)
Say it, spit it out. What is it exactly?
You're payin'? Is the amount cleanin' you out? Am I satisfactory?
Today, I'm thinkin' about the things that are deadly
The way I'm drinkin' you down
Like I wanna drown, like I wanna end me

Step on the glass, staple your tongue (ah)
Bury a friend, try to wake up (ah-ah)
Cannibal class, killing the son (ah)
Bury a friend, I wanna end me

I wanna end me
I wanna, I wanna, I wanna... end me
I wanna, I wanna, I wanna...

What do you want from me? Why don't you run from me?
What are you wondering? What do you know?
Why aren't you scared of me? Why do you care for me?
When we all fall asleep, where do we go?

(Listen)
Keep you in the dark. What had you expected?
Me to make you my art and make you a star?
And get you connected?
I'll meet you in the park, I'll be calm and collected
But we knew right from the start that you'd fall apart
'Cause I'm too expensive

It's probably somethin' that shouldn't be said out loud
Honestly, I thought that I would be dead by now (wow)
Calling security, keepin' my head held down
Bury the hatchet or bury a friend right now

The debt I owe, gotta sell my soul
'Cause I can't say no, no, I can't say no
Then my limbs are frozen, my eyes won't close
And I can't say no, I can't say no
(Careful)

Step on the glass, staple your tongue (ah)
Bury a friend, try to wake up (Ah-ah)
Cannibal class, killing the son (ah)
Bury a friend, I wanna end me

I wanna end me
I wanna, I wanna, I wanna... end me
I wanna, I wanna, I wanna...

What do you want from me? Why don't you run from me?
What are you wondering? What do you know?
Why aren't you scared of me? Why do you care for me?
When we all fall asleep, where do we go?

Men boy-badavlat oilaning farzandiman. Otam neft kompaniyasini rahbarlaridan biri edi. Juda boy, taqvodor odam edi. Nufuzli oliygohda oÊ»qir edim. Va agar aÊ¼lo baholarga bitirsam, otam menga oÊ»zim xohlagan rusumdagi avtomobilni olib berishini xohlar edim. Gohida salonga kirib uni koÊ»rib chiqar edim. 

Va nihoyat bitiruv onlari yaqinlashgach men bu fikrimni otamga bildirdim. Otam jilmayib qoÊ»ydi. Indamadi.

Bitiruv kechasi ham boÊ»lib oÊ»tdi. Men uyimizni zinalaridan chiqar ekanman. Shu sovgÊ»ani tasavvur qilar edim. 

Otam kabinetini ochdim. RoÊ»paramda koÊ»zlari quvonchga toÊ»la otam turar edi. Meni tabrikladi. Va qoÊ»lidagi oltin gÊ»ilofli  â€œQURÊ¼ONâ€ kitobini menga uzatdi.
Xafsalam pir buldi. Men otamga:

- Nahotki sizday boy odam, menga faqat shuni ilingan boÊ»lsangiz. 
Axir yakka oÊ»gÊ»lingizman. Tilagimni bajarish shunchalar qiyinmidi? -  dedimda kitobni tashlab chiqib ketdim. 

Uzoq vaqt otamga boÊ»lgan arazim tarqamadi...

Oradan yillar oÊ»tdi... Uylandim, farzandlarim koÊ»paydi. Meni boshqa davlatga ishga qoÊ»yishdi...

Bir kuni menga xat keldi. Otam vafot etib bor mulkini menga rasmiylashtirib qoldiribdi. 
Uyga kirdim. Koridordan otam xonasiga kirar ekanman boÊ»gÊ»zimda yigÊ»i qotdi. 
Otam seyfini ochdim. Qimmatbaho aksiyalar va boshqalar ustida oÊ»sha oltin gÊ»ilofli â€œQURÊ¼ONâ€ kitobi turar edi. 

Varaqladim va ne koÊ»z bilan qarayki, ichida oÊ»sha davrimda nomimga rasmiylashtirilgan, men xohlagan rusumdagi avtomashina kaliti va xujjati turar edi... 

Alqissa:
â€œ Alloh insonlarga yaxshilik xohlaydi. Lekin inson ojizdir... â€

Odamzod faqat oÊ»zi aqli yetgan yoÊ»ldan baxtni kutadi. 
Allohni esa yoÊ»llari koÊ»p.

text.text:
The car stopped and the driver got out 
- Mashina to'xtadi va haydovchi tushdi.

I bought a newspaper but I didn't read it 
- Men gazeta xarid qilgan edim, lekin uni o'qimadim.

Do you want to play tennis or are you too tired? 
- Tennis o'ynashni xohlaysizmi yoki juda charchadingizmi?

They like film, so they often go to the cinema 
- Ular filmlarni yoqtiradi, shuning uchun ular kinoxonaga tez-tez borib turishadi.

I opened the window because it was too hot 
- Men derazani ochdim, chunki juda issiq edi.
ğŸ”… "Because" gap boshida kelishi ham mumkin, u holda gapning 1-bo'lagidan so'ng vergul qo'yiladi:

Because the water wasn't clean, we didn't go swimming 
- Suv tozamasligi sababli biz cho'milishga bormadik.
ğŸ”… Bitta gapda ikkita bog'lovchi so'z kelishi ham mumkin:

It was late and was tired, so I went to bed 
- Kech bo'lgan edi va charchagan edim, shuning uchun men uyquga ketdim.

ğŸ¤ Sami Yusuf

Blessed is your face
Blessed is your name
My beloved

Blessed is your smile
which makes my soul want to fly
My beloved

All the nights and all the times that
you cared for me

But I never realised it
And now it's too late
Forgive meÂ 

Now I'm alone
filled with so much shame

For all the years
I caused you pain

If only I could sleep
in your arms again

Mother, I'm lost without you

You were the sun
that brightened my day

Now who's gonna wipe
my tears away?

If only I knew
what I know today

Mother, I'm lost without you

messages.title: Not Today

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temur Sobirov

text.text:
ğŸ—£ Alessia Cara
ğŸµ Not Today

[Verse 1]
Someday I won't be afraid of my head
Someday I will not be chained to my bed
Someday Iâ€™ll forget the day he left
But surely not today
One day I won't need a PhD
To sit me down and tell me what it all means
Maybe one day it'll be a breeze
But surely not today, but surely not today

[Chorus]
Oh you donâ€™t know what sadness means
'Till you're too sad to fall asleep
One day I'll be snoozing peacefully
But surely not today, surely not today

[Verse 2]
One day I'll swear the pain will be a blip
I'll have the hardest time recalling it
I'll be the king of misery management
But surely not today
One day that song won't make me cry anymore (oh no no)
One day Iâ€™ll get up off the bathroom floor (hey yeah)
Oh, piece by piece Iâ€™ll be restored
But surely not today, surely not
Eh, not today

[Chorus]
Oh you don't know what happy means
If itâ€™s only in your dreams
I'll be acquainted with my jollities
But surely not today, yeah surely not today

[Bridge]
Surely not-, surely, surely not-
Surely not-, surely not today

[Outro]
One day the thought of him won't hurt the same
Won't need distractions to get through the day
I guess I hope Iâ€™m gonna be okay
'Cause I'm not today

Vocabulary for IELTS speaking 

â—ï¸countless - many
â•loaded - full
â—ï¸social outcast - unpopular
â—ï¸physique -fitness
â•sleep in - sleep without an alarm
â•light-hearted - simple; non-emotional
â—ï¸cherish - appreciate
â•hilarious - really funny
â—ï¸ecstatic - excited
â•eavesdropping - secretly listening
â—ï¸milestones - big life events
â—ï¸morning people - people who like the morning
â•up to my neck - very busy 
â—ï¸a blast- a lot of fun

â•vividly - a lot of details
â—ï¸bulky - big
â•stringent - strict
â—ï¸pace - speed

messages.title: Someone You Loved

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temur Sobirov
text:
Someone You Loved
Lewis Capaldi

I'm going under and this time I fear there's no one to save me
This all or nothing really got a way of driving me crazy
I need somebody to heal
Somebody to know
Somebody to have
Somebody to hold
It's easy to say
But it's never the same
I guess I kinda liked the way you numbed all the pain

Now the day bleeds
Into nightfall
And you're not here
To get me through it all
I let my guard down
And then you pulled the rug
I was getting kinda used to being someone you loved

I'm going under and this time I fear there's no one to turn to
This all or nothing way of loving got me sleeping without you
Now, I need somebody to know
Somebody to heal
Somebody to have
Just to know how it feels
It's easy to say but it's never the same
I guess I kinda liked the way you helped me escape

Now the day bleeds
Into nightfall
And you're not here
To get me through it all
I let my guard down
And then you pulled the rug
I was getting kinda used to being someone you loved

And I tend to close my eyes when it hurts sometimes
I fall into your arms
I'll be safe in your sound 'til I come back around

For now the day bleeds
Into nightfall
And you're not here
To get me through it all
I let my guard down
And then you pulled the rug
I was getting kinda used to being someone you loved

But now the day bleeds
Into nightfall
And you're not here
To get me through it all
I let my guard down
And then you pulled the rug
I was getting kinda used to being someone you loved

I let my guard down
And then you pulled the rug
I was getting kinda used to being someone you loved.

text.text: OLIY HARBIY INSTITUTLARGA QABUL  KARANTIN SABABLI QABUL SURILADIMI?

text: Mudofaa vazirligiga qarashli oliy harbiy taÊ¼lim muassasalariga abituriyentlarni oâ€˜qishga qabul qilish uchunÂ tuman mudofaa ishlari boâ€˜limlarida(karantin sababli joriy etilgan cheklov choralariga koâ€˜ra qizil hudud etib belgilangan tumanlardan tashqari)Â ayni paytda saralash tadbirlari ijtimoiy masofani saqlagan holda davom ettirilmoqda.

text.text: Saralashning keyingi, yaÊ¼niÂ viloyat bosqichi 8 iyundan â€“ 30 iyungacha viloyat mudofaa ishlari boâ€˜limlarida oâ€˜tkaziladi.Â

text:
â€“Â harbiy-kasbiy tanlov bosqichi oliy harbiy taÊ¼lim muassasalarida 1 iyuldan â€“ 25 iyulgachaÂ oâ€˜tkazilishi koâ€˜zda tutilmoqda.

Karantin sababli respublikamizdagi vaziyat oâ€˜zgarsa, mazkur rejaga ham oâ€˜zgartirishlar kiritiladi va bu haqda abituriyentlikka nomzodlar mudofaa ishlari boâ€˜limlari tomonidan xabardor qilinadi.

text_entities.text: OLIY HARBIY INSTITUTLARGA QABUL  KARANTIN SABABLI QABUL SURILADIMI?

Saralashning keyingi, yaÊ¼niÂ viloyat bosqichi 8 iyundan â€“ 30 iyungacha viloyat mudofaa ishlari boâ€˜limlarida oâ€˜tkaziladi.Â

â€“Â harbiy-kasbiy tanlov bosqichi oliy harbiy taÊ¼lim muassasalarida 1 iyuldan â€“ 25 iyulgachaÂ oâ€˜tkazilishi koâ€˜zda tutilmoqda.

Karantin sababli respublikamizdagi vaziyat oâ€˜zgarsa, mazkur rejaga ham oâ€˜zgartirishlar kiritiladi va bu haqda abituriyentlikka nomzodlar mudofaa ishlari boâ€˜limlari tomonidan xabardor qilinadi.

text.text:
â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹ğŸ¼ â€‹â€‹"You're Not From Here"
ğŸ¤ Lara Fabian

I don't know what is going on
You turn around and touch my heart
A silent moment speaks the truth
Something has happened all at once
It should have scared me in advance
But I was falling in those eyes of yours
And so
Fear was gone
I knew there was nothing else 
I'd ever want
Chorus:
I know you
You're not from here
I've waited for you to appear
To take my breath away
And make me weep
You're not from here
Not from this here and now
Just a touch of yours
And I fly... and I fly... and I fly
I can't get used to missing you
If this is how it's gotta be
I need an angel to watch over me
No one can hold the hands of time
But I can hold you in my mind
Over and over like a melody
For now
I'll stand still
For now
I'll be filled by the memory of your skin
I know you
You're not from here
You don't belong to lies and tears
The greatness of your soul
Makes me weep
You're not from here
Not from this here and now
Just a touch of yours
And I fly... and I fly... and I fly
Chorus

text.text:
â€‹â€‹ğŸ¼ "Hold my hand"
ğŸ¤ Maher Zain 

I hear the flowers kinda crying loud
The breezes sound in sad
Oh no... 
Tell me when did we become
So cold and empty inside
Lost a way long time ago
Did we really turn out blind
We dont see that we keep hurting each other no
All we do is just fight

Now we share the same bright sun
The same round moon
Why dont we share the same love
Tell me why not
Life is shorter than most have thought

Hold my hand
There are many ways to do it right
Hold my hand
Turn around and see what we have left behind
Hold my hand my friend
We can save the good spirit of me and you
For another chance
And lets pray for a beautiful world
A beautiful world I share with you
Children seem like theyve lost their smile
On the new blooded playgrounds
Oh no
How could we ignore, heartbreaking crying sounds
And were still going on
Like nobody really cares
And we just stopped feeling all the pain because
Like its a daily basic affair

Now we share the same bright sun
The same round moon
Why dont we share the same love
Tell me why not
Life is shorter than most have thought

Hold my hand
There are many ways to do it right
Hold my hand
Turn around and see what we have left behind
Hold my hand my friend
We can save the good spirit of me and you
For another chance
And lets pray for a beautiful world
A beautiful world I share with you

No matter how far I might be
Im always gonne be your neighbor
Theres only one small planet where to be
So Im always gonna be your neighbor
We cannot hide, we can't deny
That were always gonna be neighbors
Youre neighbor, my neighbor
Were neighbors

So hold my hand
There are many ways to do it right
Hold my hand
Turn around and see what have left behind

So hold my hand
There are many ways to do it right
Hold my hand
Turn around and see what have left behind
Hold my hand my friend
We can save the good spirit of me and you
For another chance
And lets pray for a beautiful world
A beautiful world I share with you

text.text:
"Stole the show"
ğŸ¤ Kygo ft. Parson James

â€‹â€‹Darling, darling, oh, turn the lights back on now
Watching, watching, as the credits all roll down
Crying, crying, you know we're playing to a full house, house

No heroes, villains, one to blame
While wilted roses fill the stage
And the thrill, the thrill is gone
Our debut was a masterpiece
But in the end for you and me
Oh, the show, it can't go on

We used to have it all, but now's our curtain call
So hold for the applause, oh
And wave out to the crowd, and take our final bow
Oh, it's our time to go, but at least we stole the show
At least we stole the show
At least we stole the show
At least we stole the show
At least we stole the show

At least we stole the show

Darling, darling, you know that we are sold out
This is fading, but the band plays on now
We're crying, crying, so let the velvet roll down, down

No heroes, villains, one to blame
While wilted roses fill the stage
And the thrill, the thrill is gone
Our debut was a masterpiece
Our lines we read so perfectly
But the show, it can't go on

We used to have it all, but now's our curtain call
So hold for the applause, oh
And wave out to the crowd, and take our final bow
Oh, it's our time to go, but at least we stole the show
At least we stole the show
At least we stole the show
At least we stole the show
Stole the show

At least we stole the show
Stole the show
At least we stole the show

messages.title: Everything I Wanted

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: íƒœ ë¬´ë¦¬ ë°±
text:
Everything I Wanted
Billie Eilish

I had a dream
I got everything I wanted
Not what you'd think
And if I'm being honest

It might've been a nightmare
To anyone who might care
Thought I could fly (fly)
So I stepped off the Golden, mm
Nobody cried (cried, cried, cried, cried)
Nobody even noticed
I saw them standing right there
Kinda thought they might care (might care, might care)

I had a dream
I got everything I wanted
But when I wake up, I see
You with me

And you say, "As long as I'm here
No one can hurt you
Don't wanna lie here
But you can learn to
If I could change
The way that you see yourself
You wouldn't wonder why you hear
They don't deserve you"

I tried to scream
But my head was underwater
They called me weak
Like I'm not just somebody's daughter

Coulda been a nightmare
But it felt like they were right there
And it feels like yesterday was a year ago
But I don't wanna let anybody know
'Cause everybody wants something from me now
And I don't wanna let 'em down

I had a dream
I got everything I wanted
But when I wake up, I see
You with me

And you say, "As long as I'm here
No one can hurt you
Don't wanna lie here
But you can learn to
If I could change
The way that you see yourself
You wouldn't wonder why you hear
They don't deserve you"

If I knew it all then would I do it again?
Would I do it again?
If they knew what they said would go straight to my head
What would they say instead?
If I knew it all then would I do it again?
Would I do it again?
If they knew what they said would go straight to my head
What would they say instead?

IELTS ADVANTAGE

messages.title: Uncover

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: íƒœ ë¬´ë¦¬ ë°±
text:
Zara Larsson - Uncover

[Intro]
Nobody sees, nobody knows
We are a secret, can't be exposed
That's how it is, that's how it goes
Far from the others
Close to each other

[Verse 1]
In the daylight, in the daylight
When the sun is shinin'
On a late night, on a late night
When the moon is blindin'
In plain sight, plain sight
Like stars in hidin'
You and I burn on, on

[Pre-Chorus]
Put two and together, forever
We'll never change
Two and together
We'll never change

[Chorus]
Nobody sees, nobody knows
We are a secret, can't be exposed
That's how it is, that's how it goes
Far from the others, close to each other
That's when we uncover-cover-cover
That's when we uncover-cover-cover

[Verse 2]
My asylum, my asylum
Is in your arms
When the world gives heavy burdens
I can bare a thousand tons
On your shoulder, on your shoulder

text:
Camila Cabello - Real Friends

[Verse 1]
No, I think I'll stay in tonight
Skip the conversations and the "Oh, I'm fine's"
No, I'm no stranger to surprise
This paper town has let me down too many times
Why do I even try?
Give me a reason why
I thought that I could trust you, never mind
Why all the switching sides?
Where do I draw the line?
I guess I'm too naive to read the signs

[Chorus]
I'm just lookin' for some real friends
All they ever do is let me down
Every time I let somebody in
Then I find out what they're all about
I'm just lookin' for some real friends
Wonder where they're all hidin' out
I'm just lookin' for some real friends
Gotta get up out of this town (oh, ooh)

[Post-Chorus]
Oh, yeah

[Verse 2]
I stay up, talkin' to the moon (ooh)
Been feelin' so alone in every crowded room
Can't help but feel like something's wrong, yeah
'Cause the place I'm livin' in
Just doesn't feel like home

[Chorus]
I'm just lookin' for some real friends
All they ever do is let me down
Every time I let somebody in
Then I find out what they're all about
I'm just lookin' for some real friends
Wonder where they're all hidin' out
I'm just lookin' for some real friends
Gotta get up out of this town

[Post-Chorus]
Oh
Lookin' for some real friends
Oh, oh-oh

[Bridge]
I just wanna talk about nothin'
With somebody that means something
Spell the names of all the dreams and demons
For the times that I don't understand
Tell me, what's the point of a moon like this
When I'm alone again?
Can I run away to somewhere beautiful
Where nobody knows my name?

[Chorus]
I'm just lookin' for some real friends
All they ever do is let me down
Then, I let somebody in
But I find out what they're all about
I'm just lookin' for some real friends
All they ever do is let me down
I'm just lookin' for some real friends
Gotta get up out of this town, yeah

[Post-Chorus]
Oh (ah)
Oh, yeah, ah

We changed the desert into oasis
We built buildings of different lengths and sizes
And we felt so very satisfied

We bought and bought
We couldn't stop buying

We couldn't stand their crying
We thought we paid our dues
But in fact
To ourselves we're just lying

When in fact all focus should be on ourselves

text:
âœ… Yurisprudensiya sohasidagi bo'lajak yuristlar (kod: 5240100) yuridik universitetga qo'shimcha ravishda yana kamida 5 ta universitetdan birini tanlash imkoniyati mavjud:

1) Samarqand davlat universiteti
2) Termiz davlat universiteti
3) Namangan davlat universiteti
4) Qoraqalpoq davlat universiteti
5) Jahon iqtisodiyoti va diplomatiya universiteti

â‡ï¸ Toshkent davlat yuridik universitetida 4 ta yangi yo'nalish ochiladi.

text.text: Oldingi yillarda ushbu universitetda abituriyentlar hujjatni faqat bitta yo'nalishda â€“ yurisprudensiya bo'yicha topshirishgan. Shuningdek, ikkinchi yildan so'ng, ular tanlagan besh sohadan birini tanladilar.

text: ğŸ“Œ Yangi yo'nalishlar (ularning kodlari bir xil: 5240100):

text.text:
1. huquqshunoslik: xalqaro va qiyosiy huquq;
2. yurisprudensiya: davlat huquqiy faoliyati
3. yurisprudensiya: jinoiy-huquqiy faoliyat
4. yurisprudensiya: fuqarolik va biznes huquqi

text:
Bu yil mazkur 4 yo'nalishda jami 600 nafar abituriyent talabalikka qabul qilinadi.

â‰ï¸ Ushbu yo'nalish bo'yicha imtihonlar tarix fanidan (3,2 ball) va chet tilida (3,1 ball) bo'lib o'tadi.
 
ğŸ”† Yuqoridagi faktlar, o'z navbatida, huquqshunoslikka kirishni istagan abituriyentlar uchun 5 ta yo'nalish tanlash huquqini beradi.

text.text: Eslatib o'tamiz, sirtqi va kechki bo'limlar mavjud emas.

I found a love for me
Darling just dive right in

Well I found a girl beautiful and sweetÂ

Not knowing what it was
I will not give you up this time
But darling, just kiss me slow, your heart is all I own
And in your eyes you're holding mine

Baby, I'm dancing in the dark with you between my arms

She shares my dreams, I hope that someday I'll share her home

Fighting against all odds

Be my girl, I'll be your man
I see my future in your eyes

Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favorite song
When I saw you in that dress, looking so beautiful
I don't deserve this, darling, you look perfect tonight

Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favorite song
I have faith in what I see
Now I know I have met an angel in person

ğŸ¼ â€‹â€‹Perfect

I found a love for me
Darling just dive right in
And follow my lead
Well I found a girl beautiful and sweetÂ 
I never knew you were the someone waiting for me
'Cause we were just kids when we fell in love

Not knowing what it was
I will not give you up this time
But darling, just kiss me slow, your heart is all I own
And in your eyes you're holding mine

Baby, I'm dancing in the dark with you between my arms
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favorite song
When you said you looked a mess, I whispered underneath my breath
But you heard it, darling, you look perfect tonight

Well I found a woman, stronger than anyone I know
She shares my dreams, I hope that someday I'll share her home
I found a love, to carry more than just my secrets
To carry love, to carry children of our own
We are still kids, but we're so in love
Fighting against all odds
I know we'll be alright this time
Darling, just hold my hand
Be my girl, I'll be your man
I see my future in your eyes

Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favorite song
When I saw you in that dress, looking so beautiful
I don't deserve this, darling, you look perfect tonight

Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favorite song
I have faith in what I see
Now I know I have met an angel in person
And she looks perfect
I don't deserve this
You look perfect tonight

text.text:
SHOPPING - XARID QILISH
~~~~~~~~~~~

attract - jalb qilmoq
bacon - dudlangan cho`chqa go`shti
baker - nonvoy
bakery - nonvoyxona
be on sale - sotuvda bo`lmoq
be tight across the toe - oyoq panjasini qismoq
beef - mol go`shti
beetroot - qand lavlagi
berry - rezavor meva 46
bread (white, brown) - (oq, qora) non
bottled milk - shishta adishga solingan sut
bun - yog`li bulochka
butcher - qassob
buy - sotib olmoq
cabbage - karam
coffee - kofe
cake - tort
carrot - sabzi
cash-desk - kassa
cherry - olcha
chocolate - shokolad
clothes - kiyim-kechak
confectionary - pishiriq mahsulotlari
consumer goods - xarid mollari
cost - turmoq (baho haqida)
cotton-seed oil - paxta yog`i
cucumber (pickled, fresh) - bodring (tuzlangan, yangi uzilgan)
dairy shop - sut qattiq do`koni
department - bo`lim
dinner break - tushki tanaffus
display - ko`rgazma, vitrina
dress department - kiyim-kechak bo`limi
dressing gown - xalat
dry fruits - quritilgan mevalar
Eau-de-Cologne - odekolon
fit - yarashmoq
fish - baliq

fitting room - kiyib ko`rish xonasi 47
flour - un
footwear department - oyoq kiyimlari bo`limi
fruit juice - meva sharbati
provision shop - oziq-ovqat magazini
raincoat - plashch
ready-made clothes - tayyor kiyimlar
regular customer - doimiy xaridor
rice - guruch
roll - bulochka
rubber boots - rezinali botinkalar
rusk - suxari, quritilgan non
salt - tuz
sandals - yengil oyoq kiyimi
scent - atir
sell - sotmoq
shoe horn - rojoq, qoshiq (oyoq kiyimi kiyishda ishlatiladi)
shoe polish - poyabzal moyi
shoe strongs - botinka iplari
shoes - oyoq kiyimi (tufli)
shop assistant (sales woman - sotuvchi (ayol yoki erkak) or a salesman)
shopping - xarid qilish
shop window - vitrina
size - razmer
shirt - yubka
smoked fish - dudlangan baliq
sour cream - qaymoq
sour milk - qatiq
string beans - loviya
strawberries - qulupnay
sugar - qand 48
suit - kostyum (to`g`ri kelmoq)
tangerine - mandarin
tart - pirog (mevali, murabboli)
fruiterer's shop - mevalar do`koni
grapes - uzum
greengrocery - ko`katlar do`koni
green pea - ko`k no`xat
grocery - baqqollik do`koni (oziq-ovqat magazini)
ham - vetchina (cho`chqaning dudlangan yoki tuzlangan son go`shti)
hat - shlyapa
herring - seld balig`i
high boots - etik
high heeled shoes - baland poshnali oyoq kiyimi
jacket - kamzul
jam - murabbo
jeans - shim (korjoma)
macaroni - makaron
meat - go`sht
minced meat - qiyma
mutton - qo`y go`shti
numerous - ko`p, bir qator
nut - yong`oq
onion - piyoz
overcoat - palto
peach - shaftoli
pepper - qalampir
plum - olxo`ri
pork - cho`chqa
potato - kartoshka 49
poultry - uy parrandalari
tinned fish - konservalangan baliq
tinned fruite - konservalangan meva
try on - o'lchamoq, kiyib koâ€™rmoq
veal - buzoq go`shti
vegetable - sabzavot
department store - univermag
textile department - gazlama, mato bo`limi
hosiery - paypoqlar bo`limi
haberdashery - galanteriya, attorlik mollari
sports goods - sport mollari
house hold goods - xo`jalik mollari
stationary - yozuv-chizuv ishlariga oid mollar bo`limi
jewelry - zargarlik mollari bo`limi
butchery (meat shop) - go`sht do`koni
fishmonger - baliq sotuvchi
fishmongery - baliq sotiladigan do`kon
flower shop - gul sotiladigan do`kon
gift shop - sovg`a sotiladigan do`kon
trousers - shim
socks - paypoq
bare-heeled shoes - bosonojka (yozda kiyiladigan yengil oyoq kiyimi)
print - chit
underwear - ichki kiyim
pike - choâ€™rtan baliq
flat fish - kambala, qalqon baliq (ikki koâ€™zi bir tomonda bo`lgan yalpoq baliq)

text.text:
"Just a dream"
ğŸ¤ Sam Tsui and Christina Grinme

â€‹â€‹I was thinkin about you, thinkin about me
Thinkin about us, what we gonna be?
Open my eyes, yeah; it was only just a dream
So I travel back, down that road
Will you come back? No one knows
I realize, yeah, it was only just a dream

I was at the top and I was like I'm at the basement
Number one spot and now you found your a replacement
I swear now I can't take it
Knowing somebody's got my baby
And now you ain't around, baby I can't think
Shoulda put it down, shoulda got that ring
Cuz I can still feel it in the air
See your pretty face run my fingers through your hair

My lover, my life, my baby, my wife
You left me, I'm tied
Cuz I knew that it just ain't right

I was thinkin about you, thinkin about me
Thinkin about us, what we gonna be?
Open my eyes, yeah; it was only just a dream
So I travel back, down that road
Will you come back? No one knows
I realize, yeah, it was only just a dream

When I be ridin man I swear
I see your face at every turn
Tryin to get my usher over, I can let it burn
And I just hope you notice
YOu the only one I yearn for
Oh I miss you, when will I learn?

Didn't give you all my love
I guess now I got my payback
Now I'm in the club thinkin all about my baby
Hey, you were so easy to love
But wait, I guess that love wasn't enough

I'm goin through it every time that I'm alone
And now I'm missin, wishin you'd pick up the phone
But you made a decision that you wanted to move on
Cuz I was wrong

And I was thinkin about you, thinkin about me
Thinkin about us, what we gonna be?
Open my eyes, yeah; it was only just a dream
So I travel back, down that road
Will you come back? No one knows
I realize, yeah, it was only just a dream

If you ever loved somebody put your hands up
If you ever loved somebody put your hands up
And now they're gone
And you wish you could give them everything
I said, if you ever loved somebody put your hands up
If you ever loved somebody put your hands up
And now they're gone
And you wish you could give them everything

I was thinkin about you, thinkin about me
Thinkin about us, what we gonna be?
Open my eyes, yeah; it was only just a dream
So I travel back, down that road
Will you come back? No one knows
I realize, yeah, it was only just a dream

And I was thinkin about you, thinkin about me
Thinkin about us, what we gonna be?
Open my eyes, yeah; it was only just a dream
So I travel back, down that road
Will you come back? No one knows
I realize, yeah, it was only just a dream

messages.author: Temur
text:
Kiss me hard before you go
Summertime sadness
I just wanted you to know
That baby, you the best

I got my red dress on tonight
Dancin' in the dark, in the pale moonlight
Done my hair up real big, beauty queen style
High heels off, I'm feelin' alive

Oh, my God, I feel it in the air
Telephone wires above are sizzlin' like a snare
Honey, I'm on fire, I feel it everywhere
Nothin' scares me anymore
(One, two, three, four)

Kiss me hard before you go
Summertime sadness
I just wanted you to know
That baby, you the best

I got that summertime, summertime sadness
Su-su-summertime, summertime sadness
Got that summertime, summertime sadness
Oh, oh-oh, oh-oh

I'm feelin' electric tonight
Cruisin' down the coast, goin' about 99
Got my bad baby by my heavenly side
I know if I go, I'll die happy tonight

Oh, my God, I feel it in the air
Telephone wires above are sizzlin' like a snare
Honey, I'm on fire, I feel it everywhere
Nothin' scares me anymore
(One, two, three, four)

Kiss me hard before you go
Summertime sadness
I just wanted you to know
That baby, you the best

I got that summertime, summertime sadness
Su-su-summertime, summertime sadness
Got that summertime, summertime sadness
Oh, oh-oh, oh-oh

Think I'll miss you forever
Like the stars miss the sun in the morning sky
Later's better than never
Even if you're gone, I'm gonna drive (drive), drive

I got that summertime, summertime sadness
Su-su-summertime, summertime sadness
Got that summertime, summertime sadness
Oh, oh-oh, oh-oh

Kiss me hard before you go
Summertime sadness
I just wanted you to know
That baby, you the best

I got that summertime, summertime sadness
Su-su-summertime, summertime sadness
Got that summertime, summertime sadness
Oh, oh-oh, oh-oh

messages.author: Temur
text:
ğŸ—£ Mark Ronson
ğŸµ Nothing Breaks Like A Heart (Acoustic Version) (Ft Miley Cyrus)

[Chorus: Miley Cyrus]
This world can hurt you
It cuts you deep and leaves a scar
Things fall apart, but nothing breaks like a heart
And nothing breaks like a heart

[Verse 1: Miley Cyrus]
I heard you on the phone last night
We live and die by pretty lies
You know it, oh, we both know it
These silver bullet cigarettes
This burning house, there's nothing left
It's smoking, we both know it
We got all night to fall in love
But just like that we fall apart
We're broken, we're broken

[Pre-Chorus: Miley Cyrus]
Mmm, well nothing, nothing, nothing gon' save us now

[Chorus: Miley Cyrus]
Well, there's broken silence
By thunder crashing in the dark
And this broken record
Spin endless circles in the bar
This world can hurt you
It cuts you deep and leaves a scar
Things fall apart, but nothing breaks like a heart
And nothing breaks like a heart

[Verse 2: Miley Cyrus]
We'll leave each other cold as ice
And high and dry, the desert wind
Is blowin', is blowin'
Remember what you said to me?
We were drunk in love in Tennessee
And I hold it, we both know it

[Pre-Chorus: Miley Cyrus]
Mmm, that nothing, nothing, nothing gon' save us now
Nothing, nothing, nothing gon' save us now

[Chorus: Miley Cyrus]
Well, there's broken silence
By thunder crashing in the dark
And this broken record
Spin endless circles in the bar
This world can hurt you
It cuts you deep and leaves a scar
Things fall apart, but nothing breaks like a heart
And nothing breaks like a heart
Nothing breaks like a heart
And nothing breaks like a heart

[Bridge: Miley Cyrus]
Nothing, nothing, nothing gon' save us now
Nothing, nothing, nothing gon' save us now

[Chorus: Miley Cyrus]
Well, there's broken silence
By thunder crashing in the dark
And this broken record
Spin endless circles in the bar
This world can hurt you
It cuts you deep and leaves a scar
Things fall apart, but nothing breaks like a heart
And nothing breaks like a heart
But nothing breaks like a heart
And nothing breaks like a heart

messages.author: Temur
messages.title: Thunder

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temur
messages.text:
Imagine Dragons - Thunder

[Verse 1]
Just a young gun with a quick fuse
I was uptight, wanna let loose
I was dreaming of bigger things
And wanna leave my own life behind
Not a "Yes, sir," not a follower
Fit the box, fit the mold
Have a seat in the foyer, take a number
I was lightning before the thunder

[Pre-Chorus]
Thunder, thunder
Thunder, thun-
Thunder, th-th-thunder, thunder
Thunder, thunder, thun-
Thunder, th-th-thunder, thunder

[Chorus]
Thunder, feel the thunder (Thunder, thunder, thun-)
Lightning then the thunder (Thunder, th-th-thunder, thunder)
Thunder, feel the thunder (Thunder, thunder, thun-, thun-)
Lightning then the thunder, thunder, thunder (Th-th-thunder)
Thunder (Thun-, thun-)

[Verse 2]
Kids were laughing in my classes
While I was scheming for the masses
Who do you think you are?
Dreaming 'bout being a big star
They say, "You're basic," they say, "You're easy"
You're always riding in the backseat
Now I'm smiling from the stage
While you were clapping in the nosebleeds

[Pre-Chorus]
Thunder, thunder
Thunder, thun-
Thunder, th-th-thunder, thunder
Thunder, thunder, thun-
Thunder, th-th-thunder, thunder

[Chorus]
Thunder, feel the thunder (Thunder, thunder, thun-)
Lightning then the thunder (Thunder, th-th-thunder, thunder)
Thunder, feel the thunder (Thunder, thunder, thun-, thun-)
Lightning then the thunder, thunder, thunder (Th-th-thunder)
Thunder (Thun-, thun-)

[Bridge]
Thunder, feel the thunder
Lightning then the thunder, thunder

[Chorus]
Thunder, feel the thunder (Thunder, thunder, thun-)
Lightning then the thunder, thunder (Thunder, th-th-thunder, thunder)
Thunder, feel the thunder (Thunder, thunder, thun-, thun-)
Lightning then the thunder, thunder (Th-th-thunder)
Thunder, feel the thunder (Thunder, thunder, thun-)
(Never give up, never give up)
Lightning then the thunder, thunder (Thunder, th-th-thunder, thunder)
(Never give up on your dreams)
Thunder, feel the thunder (Thunder, thunder, thun-, thun-)
(Never give up, never give up)
Lightning then the thunder, thunder (Th-th-thunder)
(Never give up on your dreams)

[Outro]
Thunder, thunder, thun-
Thunder, th-th-thunder, thunder
Thunder, thunder, thun-
Thunder, th-th-thunder, thunder
(Woah-oh-ohh)
Thunder, thunder, thun-
Thunder, th-th-thunder, thunder
(Woah-oh-ohh)
Thunder, thunder, thun-
Thunder, th-th-thunder, thunder

Don't look at me

Everyday is so wonderful
Then suddenly
It's hard to breathe
Now and then I get insecure
From all the pain
I'm so ashamed

I am beautiful
No matter what they say
Words can't bring me down
I am beautiful
In every single way
Yes words can't bring me down
Oh no
So don't you bring me down today

To all your friends you're delirious
So consumed
In all your doom, ooh
Trying hard to fill the emptiness
The pieces gone
Left the puzzle undone
Ain't that the way it is

You are beautiful
No matter what they say
Words can't bring you down
Oh no

In every single way
Yes words can't bring you down
Oh no

Full of beautiful mistakes

And everywhere we go (and everywhere we go)

And tomorrow we might awake
On the other side

'Cause we are beautiful
No matter what they say
Yes words won't bring us down
Oh no

In every single way

Oh no
So don't you bring me down today

Oh, oh oh
Don't you bring me down today, yeah
Don't you bring me down, ooh
Today

Koâ€˜pchiligimiz 30 yil muqaddam shu sanada 40 nafar deputat Oâ€˜zbekiston mustaqilligi deklaratsiyasini qabul qilish tashabbusi bilan chiqqanini bilmaymiz. Yaqin tariximizdagi nodir hodisalardan biri boâ€˜lgandi u. Parlamentdagi ozchilik deputatlar vatan mustaqil boâ€˜lishi lozimligini befarq koâ€˜pchilikka uqtira olgan edi.
Nima deb oâ€˜ylaysiz, bugun ularning joyi qayerda boâ€˜lishi kerak edi? Bir yil keyinni koâ€˜ra olgan, Oâ€˜zbekiston Moskvasiz ham oâ€˜zini boshqara olishi mumkinligini parlamentdagi safdoshlaridan farqli holda vaqtliroq anglab yetgan 40 nafar deputat hozir qaysi joylarda ekan? 30 yil avval ularning yoshi oâ€˜rtacha 30-50 atrofida boâ€˜lsa, bugun 60â€“80 ni urib qoâ€˜yishdi. Ular haqida nechtamiz bilamiz? Va qanchalik bilamiz?

Shubha yoâ€˜qki, ular yurt mustaqilligini dildan istagan shaxslar edi. Va ular bugun davlat boshqaruvida emasliklari ham maâ€™lum. Biri chetga ketgan, boshqasi qamoqdan chiqdi, yana biri barcha lavozimlardan chetlatilgan. Qolganlari dunyodan oâ€˜tib ketishgan... Ular haqida hatto internetda tuzuk-quruq maâ€™lumot yoâ€˜q.
, shoir, jurnalist, bugun davlat ishida emas.
, tadbirkor, toâ€˜rt yil oldin qamoqdan chiqdi.
, tadbirkor, toâ€˜rt yil oldin qamoqdan chiqdi.

, chetda yashaydiâ€¦ 
Qolgan 31 nafar deputat haqida esa maâ€™lumot yetarlicha emas, ayniqsa oâ€˜zbek tilida!

Â«DaryoÂ» maâ€™lumotlari asosida

text:
ğŸ¶One 
ğŸµEd Sheeran

[Verse 1]
Tell me that you'll turn down the man
Who asks for your hand
Cause you're waiting for me
And I know, you're gonna be away a while
But I've got no plans at all to leave
And would you take away my hopes and dreams?
And just stay with me

[Chorus]
All my senses come to life
While I'm stumbling home as drunk as I
Have ever been and I'll never leave again
Cause you are the only one
And all my friends have gone to find
Another place to let their hearts collide
Just promise me, you'll always be a friend
Cause you are the only one

[Verse 2]
Take my hand and my
Heart and soul,Â I will
Only have these eyes for you
And you know, everything changes but
We'll be strangers if we see this through
You could stay within these walls and bleed
Or just stay with me, oh Lord now

[Chorus]
All my senses come to life
While I'm stumbling home as drunk as I
Have ever been and I'll never leave again
Cause you are the only one
And all my friends have gone to find
Another place to let their hearts collide
Just promise me, you'll always be a friend
Cause you are the only one

[Bridge]
Stumbling half drunk, getting myself lost
I am so gone, so tell me the way home
I listen to sad songs, singing about love
And where it goes wrong

[Chorus]
All my senses come to life
While I'm stumbling home as drunk as I
Have ever been and I'll never leave again
Cause you are the only one
And all my friends have gone to find
Another place to let their hearts collide
Just promise me, you'll always be a friend
Cause you are the only one.

text.text:
â€‹â€‹Do you hear me,
I'm talking to you
Across the water across the deep blue ocean
Under the open sky, oh my, baby I'm trying
Boy I hear you in my dreams
I feel your whisper across the sea
I keep you with me in my heart
You make it easier when life gets hard

I'm lucky I'm in love with my best friend
Lucky to have been where I have been
Lucky to be coming home again

Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

They don't know how long it takes
Waiting for a love like this
Every time we say goodbye
I wish we had one more kiss
I'll wait for you I promise you, I will

I'm lucky I'm in love with my best friend
Lucky to have been where I have been
Lucky to be coming home again

Lucky we're in love in every way
Lucky to have stayed where we have stayed
Lucky to be coming home someday

And so I'm sailing through the sea
To an island where we'll meet
You'll hear the music fill the air
I'll put a flower in your hair
Though the breezes through the trees
Move so pretty you're all I see
As the world keeps spinning round
You hold me right here right now

I'm lucky I'm in love with my best friend
Lucky to have been where I have been
Lucky to be coming home again

I'm lucky we're in love in every way
Lucky to have stayed where we have stayed
Lucky to be coming home someday

Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh
Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

text.text:
â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹ğŸ¼ â€‹â€‹"Wish You Were Here"
ğŸ¤ Pink Floyd

So, so you think you can tell
Heaven from hell
Blue skies from pain
Can you tell a green field
From a cold steel rail?
A smile from a veil?
Do you think you can tell?

Did they get you to trade
Your heroes for ghosts?
Hot ashes for trees?
Hot air for a cool breeze?
Cold comfort for change?
Did you exchange
A walk on part in the war
For a lead role in a cage?

How I wish, how I wish you were here
We're just two lost souls
Swimming in a fish bowl
Year after year
Running over the same old ground
And how we found
The same old fears
Wish you were here

text.text: 28-iyun Toshkent davlat yuridik universiteti tashkil etilgan kun.

text: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ O'zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidentining 2013-yil 28-iyundagi  qaroriga muvofiq

text.text: Toshkent davlat yuridik yuridik instituti Toshkent davlat yuridik universiteti etib qayta tashkil etildi.

text:
âœ”ï¸ Bugun Toshkent davlat yuridik universiteti tashkil etilganligiga 7 yil to'ldi.

ğŸ‘† Shu qisqa davr mobaynida universitet jamoasi tomonidan bir qator ijobiy ishlar amalga oshirildi, bir qator yutuqlarga erishildi, ta'lim-tarbiya sohasi tubdan isloh qilindi, ilmiy-innovatsion faoliyat takomillashtirildi, talaba va xodimlar uchun bir qator imkoniyatlar yaratildi.

text.text: Yangi O'zbekistonning yangi yuridik ta'limini yaratish borasida muhim qadamlar tashlandi.

text: ğŸ› Toshkent davlat yuridik universiteti rahbariyati barcha xodim va talabalarini hamda huquqshunoslik faoliyati bilan aloqador barcha mas'ulllarni ushbu sana bilan samimiy muborakbod etadi  hamda faoliyat samaradorligini oshirish jarayonida fidoiylik ko'rsatayotgan va bu jarayonlarda yaqindan ko'maklashib kelayotgan

text_entities.text: 28-iyun Toshkent davlat yuridik universiteti tashkil etilgan kun.
ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ O'zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidentining 2013-yil 28-iyundagi  qaroriga muvofiq
Toshkent davlat yuridik yuridik instituti Toshkent davlat yuridik universiteti etib qayta tashkil etildi.

âœ”ï¸ Bugun Toshkent davlat yuridik universiteti tashkil etilganligiga 7 yil to'ldi.

ğŸ‘† Shu qisqa davr mobaynida universitet jamoasi tomonidan bir qator ijobiy ishlar amalga oshirildi, bir qator yutuqlarga erishildi, ta'lim-tarbiya sohasi tubdan isloh qilindi, ilmiy-innovatsion faoliyat takomillashtirildi, talaba va xodimlar uchun bir qator imkoniyatlar yaratildi.
Yangi O'zbekistonning yangi yuridik ta'limini yaratish borasida muhim qadamlar tashlandi.

ğŸ› Toshkent davlat yuridik universiteti rahbariyati barcha xodim va talabalarini hamda huquqshunoslik faoliyati bilan aloqador barcha mas'ulllarni ushbu sana bilan samimiy muborakbod etadi  hamda faoliyat samaradorligini oshirish jarayonida fidoiylik ko'rsatayotgan va bu jarayonlarda yaqindan ko'maklashib kelayotgan

ğŸ“•PHRASAL VERBS WITH KEEPğŸ“•

ğŸ’¢KEEP FROM: 
â™¨ï¸Refrain, control yourself 
â—ï¸I coulnd't keep from playing football.

ğŸ’¢KEEP OUT:
â™¨ï¸Prevent someone or something from a place
â—ï¸Trucks should be kept out of the city centre.

ğŸ’¢KEEP DOWN:
â™¨ï¸Not vomit
â—ï¸The meat was so terrible that i struggled to keep it down.

ğŸ’¢KEEP ON:
â™¨ï¸Continue
â—ï¸He has to keep on delivering.

ğŸ’¢KEEP AROUND:
â™¨ï¸Keep something near you
â—ï¸I keep my notebook around when i'm doing my work.

ğŸ’¢KEEP AWAY:
â™¨ï¸To avoid someone or something
â—ï¸You must keep away medicines from children.

ğŸ’¢KEEP OFF:
â™¨ï¸To not touch something
â—ï¸He kept off the subject of his divorce.

ğŸ’¢KEEP IN:
â™¨ï¸Not allow someone out
â—ï¸Children were kept in after school.

text.text: Ingliz-tilidagi 15 ta eng mashhur sleng  qisqartmalar
1. Ain't = Am not/are not/is not - emas

text: E.g. I ain't sure - ishonchim komil emas
E.g. He ain't finished yet - u tugatmagan hali
E.g. I wanna go home. - men uyga ketishni xohlayman
E.g. I wanna coffee. - xohlayman bitta kofe

text.text: 5. Whatcha = What are you - sen nima

text: E.g. Whatcha gonna do? - sen nima qilmoqchisan?
E.g. What kinda movie is that? - U qanaqa kino
E.g. Iâ€™m sorta tired - men sal charchadim
E.g. Get outta here - bu yerdan tashqariga chiq
E.g. I eat alotta cake. - men ko'p to'rt yeyman
E.g. I have lotsa money - menda ko'p pul bor
E.g. Much of  was wasted - vaqtning ko'pi bekor ketdi
E.g. Would you like a cuppa coffee? - bir chashka kofe xohlaysizmi?
E.g. Lemme see! - ruhsatingi bilan ko'raychi
E.g. Gimme the pen! - ruchkani menga ber

Won't lie, I'd go back to you
You know, my thoughts are running loose
It's just a thing you make me do
And I could fight, but what's the use
I know I'd go back to you

I wanna hold you when I'm not supposed to
When I'm lying close to someone else
You're stuck in my head and I can't get you out of it
If I could do it all again
I know I'd go back to you
I'll go back to you
I'll go back to you
I know I'd go back to you
(Go back to you, go back to you)
(Go back to you, go back to you)
(Go back to you, go back to you)

I suppose - Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ°Ñ, ÑÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ, Ğ´ÑƒĞ¼Ğ°Ñ

I reckon she is angry at me for leaving her alone. (ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ°Ñ, Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ Ğ·Ğ»Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ·-Ğ·Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ¾, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ñ Ğ±Ñ€Ğ¾ÑĞ¸Ğ» ĞµĞµ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ñƒ).

I guess I'll go now. (Ğ¯, Ğ½Ğ°Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ğ½Ğ¾, Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ´Ñƒ). 

I imagine - Ñ Ğ´ÑƒĞ¼Ğ°Ñ, Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ°Ñ 
I imagine she earned a lot of money with her new novel. (ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ°Ñ, Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° Ğ·Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ»Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ´ĞµĞ½ĞµĞ³ Ğ½Ğ° ÑĞ²Ğ¾ĞµĞ¼ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğµ).

In my opinion this matter is not as bad as it may seem. (ĞŸĞ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¾ĞµĞ¼Ñƒ Ğ¼Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ, Ğ²ÑĞµ Ğ½Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¾, ĞºĞ°Ğº ĞºĞ°Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ).

I believe he is innocent. (Ğ¡Ñ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ½ĞµĞ²Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµĞ½). 

It seems to me that - Ğ¼Ğ½Ğµ ĞºĞ°Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾. 
It seems to me that they are conspiring against us. (ĞœĞ½Ğµ ĞºĞ°Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¾-Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¼Ñ‹ÑˆĞ»ÑÑÑ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ² Ğ½Ğ°Ñ).

To my way of thinking, his speech was not very convincing. (ĞĞ° Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ²Ğ·Ğ³Ğ»ÑĞ´, ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ñ€ĞµÑ‡ÑŒ Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ»Ğ° Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ½ÑŒ ÑƒĞ±ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ°).

text:
KO'P NARSANI TUSHINISHGA YORDAM BERUVCHI PSIXOLOGIK DALILLAR:

1. ğŸ‘¬ 16 dan 28 yoshgacha bo'lgan oraliqda vujudga kelgan do'stlik odatda eng mustaxkam va davomiy bo'ladi.

2. ğŸ˜ Ayollarni, past hirildoq ovozga ega erkaklar o'ziga rom etadi, sababi ular o'ziga ishongan va bosiq (agressiv emasdek) bo'lib tuyiladi.

3. ğŸ˜“ Hayotda ko'p qiyinchilik ko'rgan insonlar, odatda yaxshi maslaxatlar berishadi.

4. ğŸ“ Inson intellekti qanchalik yuqori bo'lsa, u shunchalik tez o'ylaydi va husnixati tushinarsiz bo'ladi.

5. ğŸ‘« Birinchi uchrashuvda notanish insonning aslida qanday odam ekanini, uning ofitsant (xizmatchi)ga bo'lgan munosabati, muomilasi orqali bilib olishingiz mumkin.

6. ğŸ˜” Aybdorlik hissi yaxshi rivojlangan insonlar, boshqalarning his-tuyg'ularini yaxshi farqlashadi.

7. ğŸ‘¤ Kam muloqot qiluvchi insonlar shunday mahoratga egaki - o'zlari haqida kam so'zlashsada, lekin siz uni huddi yaqindan bilib olgandek tasurotni uyg'otishga ustadirlar.

8. ğŸ˜· Ayollarda og'riq retseptorlari erkaklarga nisbatan ikki marotaba ko'proq va og'riqga chiqamlilik ikki martta yuqoriroqdir.

9.ğŸµ Musiqani yuqori chastotalarda tinglaganimizda, o'zimizni ancha hotirjam, baxtli va tinchlangandek his qilamiz.

10. ğŸ’­ Agar tunda fikr-hayollaringiz uyqu bermasa, ularni bir varoq qog'ozga yozing. Bundan boshingiz ancha tiniqlashadi va sizni uyquga tortishni boshlaydi.

11. ğŸ“© Hayrli tong va hayrli tun, shirin tushlar ko'ring deb bildirilgan tilak smslar, miyadagi baxt hissiga javob beruvchi qismni faollashtiradi.

Bizdan uzoqlashmangğŸ˜˜

text.text:
Ingliz tilini qo'shiqlarda o'rganing
ğŸ”˜ P. Diddy and Dirty Money ft. Skylar Grey â€“ I'm Coming Home

text:
I'm coming home
I'm coming home
Tell the world I'm coming home
Let the rain wash away all the pain of yesterday
I know my kingdom awaits and they've forgiven my mistakes
I'm coming home, I'm coming home
Tell the world that I'm coming

I'm back where I belong,
Yeah I never felt so strong
(I'm back baby)
I feel like there's nothing that I can't try
And if you with me put your hands high
(put your hands high)

If you ever lost a light before,
This ones for you
And you, the dreams are for you

I hear "The Tears of a Clown"
I hate that song
I always feel like they talking to me when it comes on
Another day another Dawn
Another Keisha, nice to meet ya, get the math I'm gone
What am I 'posed to do when the club lights come on
Its easy to be Puff, but its harder to be Sean
What if the twins ask me why I ain't marry their mom (why, damn!)
How do I respond?
What if my son stares with a face like my own
And says he wants to be like me when he's grown
Shit! But I ain't finished growing
Another night the inevitable prolongs
Another day another dawn
Just tell Keisha and Taneisha I'll be back in the morn'
Another lie that I carry on
I need to get back to the place I belong

I'm coming home
I'm coming home
Tell the world that I'm coming home
Let the rain wash away all the pain from yesterday
I know my kingdom awaits and they've forgiven my mistakes
I'm coming home, I'm coming home
Tell the world that I'm coming, home

"A House is Not A Home", I hate this song
Is a house really a home when your loved ones are gone (no)
And niggas got the nerve to blame you for it
And you know you woulda took the bullet if you saw it
But you felt it and still feel it
And money can't make up for it or conceal it
But you deal with it and you keep ballin'
Pour out some liquor, play ball and we keep ballin'
Baby we've been living in sin 'cause we've been really in love
But we've been living as friends
So you've been a guest in your own home
It's time to make your house your own
Pick up your phone, come on

I'm coming home
I'm coming home

text.text:
â€‹He deals the cards as a meditation
And those he plays never suspect
He doesn't play for the money he wins
He don't play for respect

He deals the cards to find the answer
The sacred geometry of chance
The hidden law of a probable outcome
The numbers lead a dance

I know that the spades are the swords of a soldier
I know that the clubs are weapons of war
I know that diamonds mean money for this art
But that's not the shape of my heart

He may play the jack of diamonds
He may lay the queen of spades
He may conceal a king in his hand
While the memory of it fades

I know that the spades are the swords of a soldier
I know that the clubs are weapons of war
I know that diamonds mean money for this art
But that's not the shape of my heart
That's not the shape
The shape of my heart

If I told her that I loved you
You'd maybe think there's something wrong
I'm not a man of too many faces
The mask I wear is one

But those who speak know nothing
And find out to their cost
Like those who curse their luck in too many places
And those who fear are lost

I know that the spades are the swords of a soldier
I know that the clubs are weapons of war
I know that diamonds mean money for this art
But that's not the shape of my heart

The shape of my heart

text.text:
â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹ğŸ¼ "Who Says"
ğŸ¤ Selena Gomez

I wouldn't wanna be anybody else, hey

You made me insecure,
Told me I wasn't good enough.
But who are you to judge
When you're a diamond in the rough?
I'm sure you got some things
You'd like to change about yourself.
But when it comes to me
I wouldn't want to be anybody else.

Na na na na na na na na na na na na na
Na na na na na na na na na na na na na

I'm no beauty queen
I'm just beautiful me

Na na na na na na na na na na na na na
Na na na na na na na na na na na na na

You've got every right
To a beautiful life
C'mon

Who says, who says you're not perfect?
Who says you're not worth it?
Who says you're the only one that's hurtin'?
Trust me, that's the price of beauty
Who says you're not pretty?
Who says you're not beautiful?
Who says?

It's such a funny thing
How nothing's funny when it's you
You tell 'em what you mean
But they keep whiting out the truth
It's like a work of art
That never gets to see the light
Keep you beneath the stars
Won't let you touch the sky

Na na na na na na na na na na na na na
Na na na na na na na na na na na na na

I'm no beauty queen
I'm just beautiful me

Na na na na na na na na na na na na na
Na na na na na na na na na na na na na

You've got every right
To a beautiful life
C'mon

Who says, who says you're not perfect?
Who says you're not worth it?
Who says you're the only one that's hurtin'?
Trust me, that's the price of beauty
Who says you're not pretty?
Who says you're not beautiful?
Who says?

Who says you're not star potential?
Who says you're not presidential?
Who says you can't be in movies?
Listen to me, listen to me

But when I saw you, I felt something I never felt
Come closer, I'll give you all my love
If you treat me right, baby, I'll give you everything

Now you the one that I'm calling

Blessed is your face
Blessed is your name
My beloved

Blessed is your smile
which makes my soul want to fly
My beloved

All the nights and all the times that
you cared for me

And now it's too late
Forgive meÂ

in your arms again

my tears away?

If only I knew
what I know today

Mother, I'm lost without you

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
Ingliz-tilida suhbat davomida eng ko'p qo'llaniladigan qisqartmalar (2)

16. Tellâ€™em = Tell them - ayt ularga
E.g. I donâ€™t wanna tellâ€™em - men ularga aytishni xohlamayman

17. Cos = Because - chunki
E.g. I donâ€™t like this house cos itâ€™s too big - menga bu uy yoqmayapti chunki o'ta katta ekan

18. Bitta = bit of - ozgina, sal

19. Iâ€™mma = Iâ€™m going to - ...moqchiman
E.g. Iâ€™mma talk to her - men u bilan gaplashmoqchiman

20. Gonna = Going to - ...moqchi
E.g. I'm not gonna tell you - senga aytmoqchimasman

21. Needa = Need to - kerak/muhtoj
E.g. You needa know about him - sen u haqida bilishing kerak

22. Oughta = Ought to - kerak
E.g. You oughta phone your sister - Siz singlingizga telefon qilishingiz kerak

23. Hafta = Have to - kerak
E.g. You hafta go - siz ketishingiz kerak

24. Hasta = Has to - kerak
E.g. She hasta work today - u bugun ishlashi kerak

25. Usta = Used to - manosi: oldin shunaqa edi, hozir unaqa emas
E.g. She usta live in London - u (oldin) Londonda yashar edi

26. Supposta = Supposed to - kerak
(chunki oldindan kelishilgan yoki so'z berilgan)
E.g. Iâ€™m supposta start a new job on Tuesday - men Seshanbada yangi ish boshlashim kerak

27. C'mon = Come on - 1-qo'ysangchi, 2-bo'laqol
E.g. Cmon, hurry up! - bo'laqol, shoshil/tezro bo'l!

28. Ya = You/you are - siz
E.g. Who saw ya? - Sizni kim ko'rdi?

29. Gotta = (have) got a - bor/ega
E.g. Have you gotta phone? - Telefoningiz bormi?

30. Shoulda = Should have - kerak edi
E.g. I shoulda called yesterday - kecha telefon qilishim kerak edi

27. C'mon = Come on - 1-qo'ysangchi, 2-bo'laqol
E.g. Cmon, hurry up! - bo'laqol, shoshil/tezro bo'l!

28. Ya = You/you are - siz
E.g. Who saw ya? - Sizni kim ko'rdi?

29. Gotta = (have) got a - bor/ega
E.g. Have you gotta phone? - Telefoningiz bormi?

30. Shoulda = Should have - kerak edi
E.g. I shoulda called yesterday - kecha telefon qilishim kerak edi
