â€‹â€‹It's not true
Tell me I've been lied to
Crying isn't like you
Oh-oh-oh
What the hell did I do?
Never been the type to
Let someone see right through
Oh-oh-oh

Maybe won't you take it back
Say you were tryna make me laugh
And nothing has to change today
You didn't mean to say "I love you"
I love you and I don't want to
Oh-oh-oh

Up all night on another red eye
I wish we never learned to fly
I-I-I
Maybe we should just try
To tell ourselves a good lie
I didn't mean to make you cry
I-I-I

Maybe won't you take it back
Say you were tryna make me laugh
And nothing has to change today
You didn't mean to say "I love you"
I love you and I don't want to
Oh-oh-oh

The smile that you gave me
Even when you felt like dying

We fall apart as it gets dark
I'm in your arms in Central Park
There's nothing you could do or say
I can't escape the way, I love you
I don't want to, but I love you
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh

text.text:
Ingliz tilini qo'shiqlarda o'rganing
ğŸ”˜ Alan Walker

text:
You were the shadow to my light
Did you feel us?
Another star, you fade away
Afraid our aim is out of sight
Wanna see us, alive
ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿

text.text:
Nurimga soya eding
Bilarmiding ?
Boshqa yulduz , sen so'lding
Manzilim ko'zdan yiroq , qo'rqaman
Yorqinligimizni xohlaysanmi?

text:
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
Was it all in my fantasy?
Where are you now?
Were you only imaginary?
ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿

text.text:
Qayerdasan ?
Barchasi xayolmidi?
Qayerdasan ?
Shunchaki tasavvurimmiding?

text:
Where are you now?
Atlantis, under the sea, under the sea
Where are you now?
Another dream
The monster's running wild inside of me
I'm faded, I'm faded
So lost, I'm faded, I'm faded
So lost, I'm faded
ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿

text.text:
Qayerdasan?
Atlantida, suv ostida
Qayerdasan ? Boshqa xayol
Asov maxluq ichimda chopmoqda
So'lg'inman , so'lg'in
O'zimni yo'qotdim , so'lganman

text:
These shallow waters never met what I needed
I'm letting go, a deeper dive
Eternal silence of the sea
I'm breathing, alive
ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿

text.text:
Bu sayoz suvlar menga keragi bilan uchrashmagan
Chuqurroq sho'ng'ishga kirishdim
Dengizning abadiy sukuti
Nafas olyapman , hayotman

text:
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
Under the bright but faded lights
You set my heart on fire
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿

text.text:
Qayerdasan ?
Yorqin , lek so'lg'in nurlar tagida
Yuragimni yondirding
Qayerdasan?

text:
Love me, love me
Say that you love me
Fool me, fool me
Go on and fool me

Dear, I fear we're facing a problem
You love me no longer, I know
And maybe there is nothing that I can do
To make you do

Mama tells me, I shouldn't bother
That I ought to stick to another man
A man that surely deserves me
But I think you do

So I cry and I pray, and I beg for you to

Love me, love me
Say that you love me
Fool me, fool me
Go on and fool me
Love me, love me
Pretend that you love me
Leave me, leave me
Just say that you need me

Love me, love me
Fool me, fool me
Love me, love me
Fool me, fool me

Lately, I have desperately pondered
Spent my nights awake and I wondered
What I could have done in another way
To make you stay

Reason will not reach a solution
I will end up lost in confusion
I don't care if you really care
As long as you don't go

So I cry, and I pray, and I beg for you to

Love me, love me
Say that you love me
Fool me, fool me
Go on and fool me
Love me, love me
Pretend that you love me
Leave me, leave me
Just say that you need me

Fool me, fool me

Fool me, fool me

Oh, I cry and I pray and I beg for you to love me

Say that you love me

Love me, love me (for you to love me)
Love me, love me
Say that you love me

â€‹â€‹They tried to make me go to rehab
But I said, "No, no, no"
Yes, I've been black

I won't go, go, go

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov

text.text:
Look
If you had
One shot
Or one opportunity
To seize everything you ever wanted
In one moment
Would you capture it
Or just let it slip?

text:
Yo
His palms are sweaty, knees weak, arms are heavy
There's vomit on his sweater already, mom's spaghetti
He's nervous, but on the surface he looks calm and ready
To drop bombs, but he keeps on forgettin'
What he wrote down, the whole crowd goes so loud
He opens his mouth, but the words won't come out
He's chokin', how, everybody's jokin' now
The clocks run out, times up, over, blaow
Snap back to reality, oh there goes gravity
Oh, there goes Rabbit, he choked
He's so mad, but he won't give up that easy? No
He won't have it, he knows his whole back's to these ropes
It don't matter, he's dope, he knows that, but he's broke
He's so stagnant, he knows, when he goes back to this mobile home, that's when it's
Back to the lab again, yo, this whole rhapsody
Better go capture this moment and hope it don't pass him

You better lose yourself in the music, the moment
You own it, you better never let it go
You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow
This opportunity comes once in a lifetime

You better lose yourself in the music, the moment
You own it, you better never let it go
You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow
This opportunity comes once in a lifetime
You better

His soul's escaping, through this hole that is gaping
This world is mine for the taking
Make me king, as we move toward a New World Order
A normal life is borin', but super stardom's close to post mortem
It only grows harder, only grows hotter
He blows, it's all over, these hoes is all on him
Coast to coast shows, he's known as the Globetrotter
Lonely roads, God only knows, he's grown farther from home, he's no father
He goes home and barely knows his own daughter
But hold your nose 'cause here goes the cold water
These hoes don't want him no mo', he's cold product
They moved on to the next schmo who flows, he nose dove and sold nada
So the soap opera is told and unfolds, I suppose it's old partna, but the beat goes on
Da-da-dum, da-dum, da-da

You better lose yourself in the music, the moment
You own it, you better never let it go
You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow
This opportunity comes once in a lifetime

You better lose yourself in the music, the moment
You own it, you better never let it go
You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow
This opportunity comes once in a lifetime
You better

No more games, I'ma change what you call rage
Tear this motherfuckin' roof off like two dogs caged
I was playin' in the beginnin', the mood all changed
I been chewed up and spit out and booed off stage
But I kept rhymin' and stepped right in the next cypher
Best believe somebody's payin' the Pied Piper
All the pain inside amplified by the
Fact that I can't get by with my nine to
Five and I can't provide the right type of
Life for my family 'cause man, these goddamn food stamps don't buy diapers
And its no movie, there's no Mekhi Phifer
This is my life and these times are so hard
And it's getting even harder tryna feed and water my seed, plus
Teeter totter, caught up between bein' a father and a prima donna
Baby mama drama, screamin' on her, too much
For me to wanna stay in one spot, another day of monotony's
Gotten me to the point, I'm like a snail I've got
To formulate a plot or end up in jail or shot
Success is my only motherfuckin' option, failure's not
Mom, I love you, but this trailer's got to go, I cannot grow old in Salem's Lot
So here I go, is my shot
Feet, fail me not, this may be the only opportunity that I got

You better lose yourself in the music, the moment
You own it, you better never let it go
You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow
This opportunity comes once in a lifetime[

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
"Love You Like A Love Song"

It's been said and done
Every beautiful thought's been already sung
And I guess right now here's another one
So your melody will play on and on, with the best of 'em
You are beautiful, like a dream come alive, incredible
A centerfold miracle, lyrical
You saved my life again
And I want you to know baby

I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby

And I keep hitting re-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat

I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby

And I keep hitting re-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat

Constantly, boy, you play through my mind like a symphony
There's no way to describe what you do to me
You just do to me, what you do
And it feels like I've been rescued
I've been set free
I am hypnotized by your destiny
You are magical, lyrical, beautiful
You are
And I want you to know, baby

I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby

And I keep hitting re-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat

I, I love you like a (love song, baby) love song, baby
I, I love you like a (love song, baby) love song, baby
I, I love you (I love you, I love you) like a love song, baby

And I keep hitting re-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat (like a love song)

No one compares
You stand alone, to every record I own
Music to my heart that's what you are
A song that goes on and on

I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby

And I keep hitting re-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat

I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby

I love you... like a love song

â€‹â€‹Simona
You're getting older
Your journey's been etched
On your skin

Simona
Wish I had known that know
What seemed so strong
Has been and gone

I would call you up everyday Saturday night
And we'd both stay out until the morning light
And we sang, here we go again
And though time goes by
I will always be
In a club with you
In nineteen seventy three
Singing, here we go again

Simona
Wish I was sober
So I could see clearly now
The rain has gone

text:
1. Ertalab turib yugurishni boshlayman
2. Ko'proq sayohat qilaman
3. Ingliz tilini o'rganaman
...
Sizga bu so'zlar juda ham tanish to'g'rimi? ğŸ¤” Har yili o'sha o'sha va'dalar va bu va'dalar, va'daligicha qoladi. Buni o'zgartirishning vaqti kelmadimkin? Qanday qilib deysizmi? O'z vadalaringizni

text.text: Stafford Academy, barcha darajadagi  Ingliz tili o'rganuvchilariga 2 kunlik mutlaqo bepul onlayn darslar

text:
o'tkazadi va siz bu vaqtning ichida:

-O'z bilim darajangizni aniqlab olasiz
-Ovozli habarlar orqali Ingliz tilini amaliyotda qo'llaysiz
-O'z kundaligingizga ega bo'lasiz va amaliy mashg'ulotlar bajarasiz
-Ustoz bilan alohida Kundalik yaratasiz
-Va 2ta sovg'aga ega bo'lasiz

text.text:
Siz hali ham o'ylanyabsizmi?
Boshqalar allaqachon bizga qo'shilishdi. Siz ham tengdoshlaringizdan qolib ketmang!

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
Aniq Artiklning turdosh oldidan ishlatilishi  
(Davomi ) 

âœ…

text.text: Birlikda kelgan ot shu buyum qarashli bo'lgan butun turni ifodalaganda aniq artikle bilan ishlatiladi

text:
The pine grows in northern countries 


âœ… Otlashgan sifat yoki sifatdosh oldidan aniq artikl ishlatiladi  .Otlashgan sifat yoki sifatdosh birlikda kelib ko'plik ma'nosida ishlatiladi .

text.text: The poor in some countries live in slums
The wounded were taken to the hospital

text: âœ… Orttirma darajadi sifat bilan kelgan ot aniq artikl bilan ishlatiladi  .

text.text: The highest mountains are in Asia

text: âœ… Tartib sonlar bilan kelgan otlar oldida aniq artikl ishlatiladi  .

text.text: The office is on the second floor
Agar tartib son ikkinchi bir , yana bir ma'nosida ishlatilsa noaniq artikl bilan ishlatiladi

text: We must charter a second vessel .

text.text:
Same - bir xil 
Next , following - keyingi , kelgusi 
Last - oxirgi 
Very - ayni 
Only - yakka - yagona 
Proper - mos 
Vious - oldingi 
Opposite - teskarisi 
Necessary - kerakli 
So - called
Adjacent - yonidagi 
Alleged - havola qilinadigan

text:
Eslatma : Next  - kelasi  .
Last - o'tgan ma'nosida quyudagi birikmalarda artiklesiz ishlatiladi  .

âŒ next week 
âŒ next month
âŒ next year 
âŒ last week 
âŒ last month 
âŒ last year

messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
Biografiya

Mehnat faoliyatini 1981-yilda Toshkent irrigatsiya va qishloq xoÊ»jaligini mexanizatsiyalash muhandislari institutida boshlab, kichik ilmiy xodim, katta oÊ»qituvchi, dotsent, oÊ»quv ishlari boÊ»yicha prorektor lavozimlarida ishladi.
1990-yili Respublika Oliy Soveti deputatligiga saylanib, bir vaqtning oÊ»zida Mandat komissiyasining raisi sifatida ham faoliyat koÊ»rsatdi.
1992-yilda Toshkent shahrining Mirzo UlugÊ»bek tumani hokimi lavozimiga tayinlandi.
1996-2001 yillarda Jizzax viloyati hokimi.
2001-2003 yillar mobaynida Samarqand viloyati hokimi lavozimlarida ishladi.
1995-2003 yillarda OÊ»zbekiston Respublikasi Oliy Majlisining deputati sifatida ham faoliyat olib bordi.
2003-yilda OÊ»zbekiston Bosh vaziri etib tasdiqlandi[2][3] va 2005, 2010, 2015 yillarda Oliy Majlis palatalari tomonidan ushbu lavozimga yana uch marta qayta tasdiqlandi.
2016-yil 2-sentabrda Prezident Islom Karimovning vafot etishi munosabati bilan Oliy Majlis Mirziyoyevni Birinchi Prezident dafn marosimini oÊ»tkazish boÊ»yicha komissiyaga rais etib tayinladi.

Asarlari:

Erkin va farovon, demokratik Oâ€˜zbekiston davlatini birgalikda barpo etamiz. Oâ€˜zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti lavozimiga kirishish tantanali marosimiga bagâ€˜ishlangan Oliy Majlis palatalarining qoâ€˜shma majlisidagi nutq / Sh.M. Mirziyoyev. - Toshkent : Oâ€˜zbekiston, 2016. â€” 56 b.
Tanqidiy tahlil, qatÊ¼iy tartib-intizom va shaxsiy javobgarlik â€” har bir rahbar faoliyatining kundalik qoidasi boâ€˜lishi kerak. Mamlakatimizni 2016 yilda ijtimoiy-iqtisodiy rivojlantirishning asosiy yakunlari va 2017 yilga moâ€˜ljallangan iqtisodiy dasturning eng muhim ustuvor yoâ€˜nalishlariga bagâ€˜ishlangan Vazirlar Mahkamasining kengaytirilgan majlisidagi maÊ¼ruza, 2017 yil 14 yanvar / Sh.M. Mirziyoyev. â€” Toshkent : Oâ€˜zbekiston, 2017. â€” 104 b.
Qonun ustuvorligi va inson manfaatlarini taÊ¼minlash â€” yurt taraqqiyoti va xalq farovonligining garovi. Oâ€˜zbekiston Respublikasi Konstitutsiyasi qabul qilinganining 24 yilligiga bagâ€˜ishlangan tantanali marosimdagi maÊ¼ruza. 2016 yil 7 dekabr

.M.Mirziyoev. â€” Toshkent: â€Oâ€˜zbekistonâ€œ, 2017. â€” 48 b.
Buyuk kelajagimizni mard va olijanob xalqimiz bilan birga quramiz. Mazkur kitobdan Oâ€˜zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti Shavkat Mirziyoevning 2016 yil 1 noyabrdan 24 noyabrga qadar Qoraqalpogâ€˜iston Respublikasi, viloyatlar va Toshkent shahri saylovchilari vakillari bilan oâ€˜tkazilgan saylovoldi uchrashuvlarida soâ€˜zlagan nutqlari oâ€˜rin olgan.

.M.Mirziyoev. â€” Toshkent: : â€Oâ€˜zbekistonâ€œ, 2017. â€” 488 b.[18]

text.text:
Vocabulary notes: 
1.  abolish - tugatmoq 
2.  admit to - ...ga ruxsat bermoq 
3.  achieve world fame - jahonga mashhur bo`lmoq 
4.  badminton - badminton 
5.  basket-ball court - basketbol maydoni 
6.  boxing - boks 
7.  centre forward - markaziy hujumchi 
8.  chariot-racing - arava poygasi 
9.  compete - musobaqalashmoq (bellashmoq) 
10.  compititor - raqib 
11.  compulsory - majburiy 
12.  crowd - guruh, to`da 
13.  cycling - velosiped minish 
14.  International Olimpic Committee - Xalqaro Olimpiada Qo`mitasi 
15.  keep up the pace - tezlikni saqlamoq 
16.  match - o`yin 
17.  national - milliy 
18.  observe - amal (rioya) qilmoq 
19.  Olimpic Flame - Olimpiada alangasi (mash`ali) 
20.  Olimpic games - Olimpiada o`yinlari 
21.  to pay a great attention to - katta ahamiyat bermoq 
22.  physical culture - jismoniy tarbiya 
23.  reserve - zapas qilmoq 
24.  restore - qayta tiklamoq 
25.  rowing - qayiqda suzish 
26.  running - yugurish 
27.  serve - xizmat qilmoq 62 
28.  to set up a world record - jahon rekordini o`rnatmoq 
29.  shooting - miltiq otish 
30.  skating - konki uchish 
31.  skiing - chang`i uchish 
32.  skill - mahorat 
33.  sports club - sport klubi 
34.  daring - jur`atli, jasur 
35.  to depend on - bog`liq bo`lmoq 
36.  end in draw - durang bilan tugamoq 
37.  fancing - qilichbozlik 
38.  foster - tarbiyalamoq 
39.  goal-keeper - darvozabon 
40.  good-will - yaxshi niyat 
41.  "home" team - mezbonlar komandasi 
42.  in honour of - sharafiga 
43.  hunting - ov qilish 
44.  ice-hockey - xokkey 
45.  symbolize - simvol qilib olmoq 
46.  visitors team - mehmonlar komandasi 
47.  win - yutmoq 
48.  wrestling - kurash 
49.  bencher - zapas o`yinchi 
50.  big league games -yuqori liga komandalari o`yini 
51.  to be in an off-side position - o`yindan yuqori holatda bo`lmoq 
52.  centre back - markaziy himoyachi 
53.  chalenger - raqib 
54.  corner kick - burchakdan tepish 
55.  cup - kubok 
56.  to cut off - ushlab qolmoq 
57.  defeat - yutqazish 63 
58.  to defeat - yutqazmoq 
59.  direct free kick - jarima to`pi(ni) 
60.  drive - qattiq zarba 
61.  fieldplayer - maydondagi o`yinchi 
62.  to foil - zarbani qaytarmoq 
63.  forward - hujumchi 
64.  fullback - himoyachi 
65.  from well out - uzoqdan 
66.  from close in - yaqindan 
67.  gate jam - darvoza oldida sur-sur 
68.  goal - darvoza, gol 
69.  halfback - yarim himoyachi 
70.  to handle the ball - qo`l bilan o`ynamoq 
71.  to head the ball over the bar - to`pni bosh bilan urib darvoza to`ridan oshirib yubormoq 
72.  an inside left (right) - chap (oâ€™ng) tomondagi oâ€™rta hujumchi 
73.  kick-off - to'pni birinchi urish 
74.  left (right) winger - chap (o`ng) qanot hujumchisi 
75.  linesman - liniyadagi sudya 
76.  line-up - jonli devor (to`siq) 
77.  misskick - (to`pni) xato tepish 
78.  muff - lapashang, landovur 
79.  penalty kick - 11 metrlik jarima to`pi 
80.  penalty box - jarima maydonchasi 
81.  point margin - ochkolar nisbatidagi farq 
82.  to score a goal - (darvozaga) to`p kirgizmoq 
83.  referee - sudya 
84.  sign board -tablo 
85.  second division games - quyi liga komandalari o`yini 
86.  soceer -futbol (Angliyada) 64 
87.  to widen the gap -farqni oshirmoq 
88.  to bat the ball - to`pni yerga urmoq 
89.  to bar - to`smoq 
90.  to block - o`yinchini ushlamoq 
91.  to cut into the zone - raqib zonasiga shiddat bilan kirmoq 
92.  to dribble the ball - to`pni yerga urib oldinga yurmoq 
93.  to drop (throw in, shoot) basket - to`pni savatga tashlamoq, otmoq 
94.  to draw (to pull) the opponent - raqibni o`ziga jalb qilmoq 
95.  personal (technical) foul - shaxsiy xato 
96.  to put the ball in play - to`pni o`yinga kiritmoq 
97.  to strike the ball out - to`pni raqibning qo`lidan urib olmoq 
98.  to team up - komandadoshiga yordam bermoq 
99.  to drop the ball - to`pni qo`lga kiritmoq 
100.  spiker - to`pni kuchli zarb bilan uradigan o`yinchi (volebol)

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
1.  What sports society do you belong to? - Siz qaysi sport jamiyatiga a`zosiz? 
2.  How the winter sports season is in full swing. - Hozir qishki sport mavsumi avjida. 
3.  The compitition will be opened with the long-distance run.- Musobaqa uzoq masofaga yugurish bilan ochiladi. 
4.  A tournament - turnir 
5.  a gymnastic compitition - Gimnastika bo`yicha musobaqa 
6.  an International contest - Xalqaro musobaqa 
7.  The national team . - Mamlakat terma komandasi 
8.  a contestant - musobaqa qatnashchisi 
9.  to qualify for the finals - finalga chiqmoq 
10.  semi-finals - yarim final 
11.  The world high-jump record holder. - yuqoriga sakrash bo`yicha dunyo chempioni 
12.  Honourable Master of Sports - Xizmat ko`rsatgan sport masteri 
13.  A medal winner - medal sovrindori 
14.  a triple champion - uch karra chempion 
15.  to win the championship - birinchilikni qo`lga kiritmoq 
16.  to compete for the first place birinchi o`rin uchun musobaqalashmoq 
17.  to surprise defeat - tasodify yengilish (mag`lubiyat) 
18.  to try to even up - hisobni tenglashtirishga harakat qilmoq 
19.  A trainer (coach) - mashq qildiruvchi, o`rgatuvchi 
20.  What team do you root to? - Siz qaysi komanda ishqibozisiz? 67 
21.  The audience gave the English team a hearty welcome. - Tomoshabinlar Angliya komandasini yaxshi kutib oldilar. 
22.  In whose favour is the goal? - Gol kimning foydasiga? 
23.  What is the score? - Hisob necha (qanday)? 
24.  The score is 2:0 (two-nill). - Hisob 2:0. 
25.  The score was 3:3 draw - Hisob 3:3, durang 
26.  to open the score - hisobni ochmoq 
27.  a baton - estafeta tayoqchasi 
28.  to race in the 100 metres - 100 metrga yugurishga qatnashmoq 
29.  to take the lead - oldinga chiqib olmoq 
30.  Were you at the boxing match? - Siz boks musobaqasida boâ€™lganmisiz? 
31.  light weight - yengil vazn 
32.  middle weight - o`rta vazn 
33.  heavy weight - og`ir vazn 
34.  He floored (put him down) in five minutes. - U besh daqiqada uning yelkasini yerga tegizdi. 
35.  Who is the champion in free- style wrestling? - Erkin kurashda kim chempion? 
36.  What`s his own weight? - Uning vazni qancha? 
37.  He turns the scale at (to) 120 kgs. - Uning vazni 120 kg. 
38.  The team started off a fine style. - Komanda o`yinni yaxshi usulda boshladi. 
39.  They opened score in the first 5 minutes. - Ular birinchi 5 minut ichida hisobni ochishdi. 
40.  In the first time the visiting team took the initiative.- Birinchi taymda mehmon komanda tashabbusni o'z qoâ€™liga oldi. 
41.  They were rough. - Ular qo`pol o`ynashdi. 
42.  The skill of both teams was particularly equal. - Ikkala komandaning mahorati teng edi. 
43.  N. is equally good in defence and attack- N.himoyada ham, hujumda ham yaxshi o`ynaydi. 
44.  He is a master in the art of heading. - U to`pni bosh bilan urishga usta. 68 
45.  The referee had to give an extra time. - Hakim qo`shimcha vaqt berishga majbur bo`ldi. 
46.  to go in for sports - sport bilan shug`ullanmoq 
47.  to be keen on - qiziqmoq, shug`ullanmoq 
48.  to play versus - qarshi o`ynamoq 
49.  in favour of - foydasiga

text.text: â€‹â€‹ğŸ˜…Bugungi kunni yorqin xotiralar bilan oâ€˜tkazamiz!

text:
Ha, bugun 1-avgust boâ€˜lishiga qaramasdan poytaxt koâ€˜chalari bum-boâ€˜sh, xuddi kinolardagi tashlab ketilgan shaharga oâ€˜xshaydi. 

Lekin 4-5 yil oldin 1-avgust bunaqa emas edi. Bu kunga alohida tayyorgarlik koâ€˜rilar edi. Taksistlar yoâ€˜lkira narxini besh-olti barobarga oshirib olishar edi. 

Yil boâ€˜yi birov ishi ham boâ€˜lmagan etikdoâ€˜zning ishi yurishib ketar ediğŸ¤£, uning vazifasi shippakning ichiga imkon boricha ustalik va butun sanâ€™atini ishga solib oâ€˜ta mohirona telefonni joylashtirish edi. Odamlar sal qolsa etikdoâ€˜zning qabuliga yozilish uchun navbatga turishar edi. 

Zangiotada chala mullalar va loâ€˜lilarning ishi-ku, imtihondan bir hafta oldin boshlanib ketar ediğŸ¤¦ğŸ»â€â™‚.

text.text:
- Ha, qayoqqa ketyapsan? 
- Zangiotaga borib bir duo olib kelaylik.
- Oâ€˜qish-chi? 
- Oâ€˜qish toâ€˜xtab turadi, Zangiota ruhlarini shod qilmasak, oâ€˜qishga kirolmas ekanmiz.
â€œEng katta oâ€˜qishlarga kirib keting, imtihonda savollar oson tushsin, koâ€˜zingizni yumib ishlab chiqing

text:
â€ shunga oâ€˜xshash ğŸ˜‚

Milisiya amakilar ham aynan shu kuni ishni qilib qolishar edi, hatto milisiyalargacha x-variant sotishar edi, ular ham ertalabdan oâ€˜lja izlab koâ€˜chaga chiqqan yirtqichdek harakat qilishar edi. 

Kimdir bunkerga kirib ketgan, kimdir x-variant izlagan, ota-onalar, bobo-momolar abituriyentlardan koâ€˜ra koâ€˜proq harakat qilishar edi. 

Kimdir esa oâ€˜sha chekka bir qishlogâ€˜idan faqat bilimigagina ishonib kelgan va oâ€˜sha

Ishqilib 1-avgust universitet farroshigacha pul qiladigan kun edi. Korrupsiya miqyosini tasavvur qilyapsizmi? Loâ€˜ligacha â€œleviyâ€ qiladigan tizim yoâ€˜q boâ€˜ldi. 

Toâ€˜liq yoâ€˜q boâ€˜ldi deb ayta olmayman, chunki hali DTM va Davlat qabul komissiyasining boshida oâ€˜zgarishni xohlamaydigan, har qanday yangilikni oâ€˜zlariga dushman deb biladigan â€œdinozavrâ€lar bor ekan, bu tizim hali ham kimlargadir katta daromad manbai boâ€˜lib qolaveradi.

text.text: Bugun 1-avgust - hech qanday kun. Uyda oâ€˜tir. Pandemiya. Karantin.â€

Yozilgan izohlarni oâ€˜qib kayfiyatingiz koâ€˜tarilishi shubhasiz!ğŸ˜‰

messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
"Go" fe'li so'z birikmalari

go abroad - chet elga chiqish
go astray - adashib qolish
go bad - buzulib qolish, aynib qolish
go bald - kal bo'lish
go bankrupt - bankrot bo'lish
go blind - ko'r bo'lish / sezmay qolish
go crazy - jinni bo'lish
go dark - qorong'ulashish
go deaf - kar bo'lish
go fishing - baliq ovlash
go mad - jahli chiqish
go missing - yo'qolish
go on foot - piyoda yurish
go online - aloqaga chiqish
go overseas - okeandan o'tish
go quiet - jim bo'lib qolish
go sailing - suzish / qayiqda suzish
go to war - urush boshlash
go yellow - sariq bo'lish

text.text: Aniq artikl bilan ishlatiladigan turg'un birikmalar

text:
âœ³ï¸ Quyidagi birikmalar ingliz tilida aniq artikl bilan ishlatiladi:

âœ… all the same - baribir, qaramasdan  
âœ… keep the house - uyni boshqarmoq
âœ… by the time - borib, -guncha
âœ… lay the table - dasturxon yozmoq
âœ… by the way - aytgancha 
âœ… on the contrary - aksincha
âœ… make the bed - yotoqni yig'ishtirmoq
âœ… do the bed - yotoqni tayyorlamoq  
âœ… do the cooking - ovqat tayyorlamoq  
âœ… do the washing up - idishlarni yuvmoq
âœ… on the whole - umuman olganda
âœ… tell the time - vaqtni aytmoq
âœ… tell the truth - haqiqatni aytmoq
âœ… do the shopping - bozor qilmoq
âœ… for the sake of - sharafiga 
âœ… the same - bir xil
âœ… for the time being - hozircha 
âœ… the right side - toÊ»gâ€™ri yoÊ»lda/tarafda
âœ… the wrong side - notoÊ»gâ€™ri yoÊ»lda/tarafda
âœ… under the influence of - taâ€™sirida, taâ€™siri ostida
âœ… under the impression - taassurot ostida
âœ… in the distance - uzoqda 
âœ… in the daytime - kunduzi
âœ… in the end - oxiri, niyohat 
âœ… in the long run - borib-borib, oxirida  
âœ… in the sun - quyoshda
âœ… in the dark - qorongâ€™uda
âœ… in the shade - soyada
âœ… in the rain - yomgâ€™ir ostida
âœ… in the meantime - hozirda
âœ… in the past - oÊ»tmishda
âœ… in the original - o'z tilida 
âœ… on the phone - telefonda
âœ… in the face of - biror sharoitga qaramasdan, natijasida

Everything inside you is dark and twisted
Oh, but it's okay to be different
'Cause baby, so am I (so am I, so am I, so am I-I-I-I-I)

Can you hear the whispers all across the room?
You feel her eyes all over you like cheap perfume
You're beautiful, but misunderstood
So why you tryna be just like the neighborhood?

So let me tell you 'bout my little secret
I'm a little crazy underneath this
Underneath this

And call me Harley
And we'll make 'em scream

Muloqot uchun yangi iboralar. 

 Catch me later â€” Keyinroq gaplashamiz

 Clear the way! â€” Yo'lni bo'shating

 Come back anytime â€” Xohlagan paytda yana tashrif buyuring

 Come right in â€” Kirib o'ting

 Could I call you later? â€” Keyinroq qo'ng'iroq qilsam maylimi?

 Could I join you? â€” Sizga qo'shilsam bo'ladimi?

 Don't push (me)! â€” Menga bunday gapirmang! 

 Enjoy your meal! â€” Yoqimli ishtaha

 Guess what! â€” Nimaligini toping!

 I doubt that. - Shubhalanayapman

 I had a lovely time â€” Vaqtimni yaxshi o'tkazdim

 I spoke too soon â€” O'ylamay gapirib yuboribman

 Keep in touch. â€” Aloqada bo'lib turing

 Leave it to me. - Buni menga qo'yib bering

 Make it two. â€” Menga ham qo'shib oling ( asosan kafelarda )

 No can do. â€” Buni qila olmayman

 No way! â€” Hechamda ! 

 Pull up a chair. â€” Bizga qo'shiling.

messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
Oâ€˜qish, mutolaaning foydalari

1. Vasvasa, gâ€˜am-anduhlarni haydaydi.

2. Nohaqlikka tushishdan uzoq boâ€˜ladi.

3. Bekorchilardan yiroq boâ€˜ladi.

4. Til burro boâ€˜ladi, kalom mashqini oladi, ohang qilib soâ€˜zlamaydi, balogâ€˜at, fasohatga zeb bermaydi.

5. Aql rivojlanadi, zehn yangilanadi, xotira kuchayadi.

6. Bilimga boy boâ€˜lib, yodlash, tushunchasi koâ€˜p boâ€˜ladi.

7. Insonlar tajribalarini, ulugâ€˜lar hikmatlarini, ulamolar kashfiyotlarini oâ€˜zlashtiradi.

8. Ilmiy malakasini oshiradi, hayot haqidagi madaniy onggini oshiradi.

9. Iymoni ziyoda boâ€˜ladi xususan Islom dini haqidagi kitoblarni oâ€˜qiganda. Zero, kitob eng buyuk nasihatchi, yomonliklardan qaytarguvchi va yaxshi ishlarga buyurguvchidir.

10. Zehn parishonligidan, qalb boâ€˜linishidan, vaqt zoe' boâ€˜lishidan panoh topadi.

11. Soâ€˜zni puxta tushunadi, ifoda uslubini, iboraning maqsadini, jumla tushunchasini, hikmat sirlarini anglaydi.

messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
messages.text:
Good Years
Artist:Zayn_Malik 

I'd rather be anywhere
Anywhere but here
I'd rather be anywhere
Anywhere but here
I close my eyes and see a crowd of a thousand tears
I pray to God I didn't waste all my good years
All my good years
All my good years

The voices screaming loud as hell
We don't care 'bout no one else
Nothing in the world could bring us down
Now we're so high among the stars without a worry
And neither one, one of us wants to say we're sorry

I'd rather be anywhere
Anywhere but here
I'd rather be anywhere
Anywhere but here
I close my eyes and see a crowd of a thousand tears
I pray to God I didn't waste all my good years
All my good years
All my good years

Too much drugs and alcohol
What the hell were we fighting for?
'Cause now the whole damn world will know
That we're too numb and just too dumb to change the story
Neither one, one of us wants to say we're sorry

I'd rather be anywhere
Anywhere but here
I'd rather be anywhere
Anywhere but here
I close my eyes and see a crowd of a thousand tears
I pray to God I didn't waste all my good years
All my good years
All my good years

Need a chance just to breathe, feel alive
And when the day meets the night, show me the light
Feel the wind and the fire hold the pain deep inside
It's in my eyes
In my eyes

I'd rather be anywhere
Anywhere but here
I'd rather be anywhere
Anywhere but here
I close my eyes and see a crowd of a thousand tears
I pray to God I didn't waste all my good years
All my good years
All my good years

I pray to God I didn't waste all my good years
All my good years
All my good years

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
How can I say this without breaking?
How can I say this without taking over?
How can I put it down into words?
When it's almost too much for my soul alone

I loved, and I loved and I lost you
I loved, and I loved and I lost you
I loved, and I loved and I lost you

And it hurts like hell
Yeah, it hurts like hell

I don't want them to know the secrets
I don't want them to know the way I loved you
I don't think they'd understand it, no
I don't think they would accept me, no

I loved, and I loved and I lost you
I loved, and I loved and I lost you
I loved, and I loved and I lost you

And it hurts like hell
Yeah, it hurts like hell

Dreams fight with machines
Inside my head like adversaries
Come wrestle me free
Clean from the war
Your heart fits like a key
Into the lock on the wall

I turn it
I turn it
But I can't escape
I turn it over
I turn it over

I loved, and I loved and I lost you
I loved, and I loved and I lost you
I loved, and I loved and I lost you

text.text:
âœ…Phrasel Verb Time

ğŸ’  Phrasal Verbs with Take

ğŸ”¸ Take after somebody - Biror kimga o'xshash ko'rinmoq yoki xarakter ega bo'lmoq (asosan qarindoshlar o'rtasida)

ğŸ”¸ Take something apart - Biror narsani qismlarga bo'lmoq.

ğŸ”¸ Take something back - 1) Olib turgan narsani qaytarmoq. 2) Biror aytgan narsa xato yoki noto'g'ri ekanligini tan olmoq.

ğŸ”¸ Take something down - 1) Tuzilmani qismlarga ajratmoq. 2) Qog'ozga biror narsani yozib olmoq.

ğŸ”¸ Take somebody in - Kimgadir uyingizda qolishga ruhsat bermoq.

ğŸ”¸ Take something in - 1) Ma'lumotni qabul qilish va tushunmoq. 2) Kiyimni mos keladigan darajada kichraytirmoq.

ğŸ”¸ Take off - 1) Samalyotga nisbatan yerdan ko'tarilmoq. 2) Juda tez muvaffaqiyatga uchrash 3) To'satdan biror joyni tark etmoq (norasmiy)

ğŸ”¸ Take something off - 1) Kiyimni yechmoq. 2) Bir necha muddat ishga bormaslik.

ğŸ”¸ Take something on - Biror bir ishni yoki ma'sulyatni qabul qilmoq,

ğŸ”¸ Take somebody on - 1) Kimnidur ishga qabul qilmoq. 2) Kimgadir qarshi urishmoq yoki musobaqalashmoq.

ğŸ”¸ Take somebody out - Restorant yoki kinoga olib borib harajatni yonidan to'lamoq.

ğŸ”¸ Take something out - Biror joydan olib qo'ymoq.

ğŸ”¸ Take something out on somebody - Biror narsadan charchab yoki g'azabda begunoh insonga yomon muomilada bo'lmoq.

ğŸ”¸ Take over something - Boshqaruvni qo'lga olmoq.

ğŸ”¸ Take somebody through something - Biror narsani biror kimga bo'lim bilan tushuntirib bermoq.

ğŸ”¸ Take up something - 1) Joyni to'ldirish yoki vaqtni joylab olmoq. 2) Biror narsani doimiy qilishni boshlamoq.

ğŸ”¸ Take somebody up on something - Taklif yoki taklifnomani qabul qilmoq.

ğŸ”¸ Take something up with somebody - Biror kimga qandaydir muammodan shikoyat qilmoq.

messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
ğŸš© Ingliz-tilidagi 15 ta eng mashhur sleng  qisqartmalar

1. Ain't = Am not/are not/is not - emas
E.g. I ain't sure - ishonchim komil emas

2. Ain't = Has not/have not - ...magan
E.g. He ain't finished yet - u tugatmagan hali

3. Wanna = Want to - xohlayman
E.g. I wanna go home. - men uyga ketishni xohlayman

4. Wanna = Want a - xohlayman bitta
E.g. I wanna coffee. - xohlayman bitta kofe

5. Whatcha = What are you - sen nima
E.g. Whatcha gonna do? - sen nima qilmoqchisan?

6. What Kinda = Kind of - qanaqa
E.g. What kinda movie is that? - U qanaqa kino

7. Sorta = Sort of - sal, ozgina
E.g. Iâ€™m sorta tired - men sal charchadim

8. Outta = Out of - ...dan tashqari
E.g. Get outta here - bu yerdan tashqariga chiq

9. Alotta = A lot of - ko'p
E.g. I eat alotta cake. - men ko'p to'rt yeyman

10. Lotsa = Lots of - ko'p
E.g. I have lotsa money - menda ko'p pul bor

11. Mucha = Much of - ko'pi
E.g. Much of  was wasted - vaqtning ko'pi bekor ketdi

12. Cuppa = Cup of - bir chashka
E.g. Would you like a cuppa coffee? - bir chashka kofe xohlaysizmi?

13. Dunno = Donâ€™t know - bilmadim
E.g. I dunno - bilmadim

14. Lemme = Le - ruhsat ber
E.g. Lemme see! - ruhsatingi bilan ko'raychi

15. Gimme = Give me - menga ber
E.g. Gimme the pen! - ruchkani menga ber

text:

Hold your breath and count to ten

For this is the end
I've drowned and dreamt this moment
So overdue I owe them
Swept away, I'm stolen

Let the sky fall
When it crumbles
We will stand tall
Face it all together

Let the sky fall
When it crumbles
We will stand tall
Face it all together
At skyfall
At skyfall

Skyfall is where we start
A thousand miles and poles apart
Where worlds collide and days are dark
You may have my number, you can take my name
But you'll never have my heart

Let the sky fall
When it crumbles
We will stand tall
Face it all together

Let the sky fall
When it crumbles
We will stand tall
Face it all together
At skyfall

Where you go I go
What you see I see
I know I'd never be me
Without the security
Of your loving arms
Keeping me from harm
Put your hand in my hand
And we'll stand

When it crumbles
We will stand tall
Face it all together

Let the sky fall
When it crumbles
We will stand tall
Face it all together
At skyfall

We will stand tall
At skyfall

ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ 'MODIFIER' - 'hol' hisoblanib ish harakatini (qachon?), (qayerda?), (qanday qilib?) bajarilganini ifodalaydi va shu so'roqlarga javob bo'ladi. Ko'p hollarda 'predlog' ya'ni 'kelishik' lar bilan qo'llanilib 3 turga bo'linadi.
1. ' Modifier of manner'- (now?) ya'ni (qanday?) so'rog'iga javob bo'lib, ish harakatini bajarilish tarzini ifodalaydi.
Misol: I walked carefully. (bu yerda 'modifier of manner'  'carefully' so'zidir)
2. ' Modifier of place'-(where?) ya'ni (qayerda?) so'rog'iga javob bo'lib, ish harakatini bajarilish joyini ifodalaydi.
Misol: I walked carefully in the park. (bu yerda 'modifier of manner'  'carefully' ,'modifier of place' esa 'in the park')
3. ' Modifier of time'-(when?) ya'ni (qachon so'rog'iga javob bo'lib ish harakatini bajarilish vaqtini ifodalaydi.
Misol: I walked carefully in the park yesterday. (bu yerda 'modifier of manner'> 'carefully' ,'modifier of place' >'in the park' ,'modifier of time' esa > 'yesterday' hisoblanadi )
    Agar 3 tur ham bir gapda kelsa birinchi modifier of manner', ikkinchi 'modifier of place' va uchinchi 'modifier of time' keladi. Ammo 'madifier of time' gapning boshida kelsa ham xato hisoblanmaydi.
Misol: Yesterday I walked carefully in the park.

text:
Writing va So'zlashuvda as qotuvchi frazalar juda foydali
â‡ï¸Similarity
so, in the same way, just as â€¦ so too, likewise, similarly

  â‡ï¸Exception/Contrast
but, however, in spite of, on the one hand â€¦ on the other hand, nevertheless, nonetheless, notwithstanding, in contrast, on the contrary, still, yet

  â‡ï¸Sequence/Order
first, second, third, â€¦ next, then, finally

  â‡ï¸Time
after, afterward, at last, before, currently, during, earlier, immediately, later, meanwhile, now, recently, simultaneously, subsequently, then

  â‡ï¸Example
for example, for instance, namely, specifically, to illustrate

  â‡ï¸Emphasis
even, indeed, in fact, of course, truly

  â‡ï¸Place/Position
above, adjacent, below, beyond, here, in front, in back, nearby, there

  â‡ï¸Cause and Effect
accordingly, consequently, hence, so, therefore, thus

  â‡ï¸Additional Support or Evidence
additionally, again, also, and, as well, besides, equally important, further, furthermore, in addition, moreover, then

  â‡ï¸Conclusion/Summary
finally, in a word, in brief, briefly, in conclusion, in the end, in the final analysis, on the whole, thus, to conclude, to summarize, in sum, to sum up, in summary

ğŸ‘‰

text:
ğŸš© Phrasal verbs (D)

âœ… damage (pay FOR) - zarar uchun toÊ»lamoq
âœ… damage TO sth -â€¦ga zarar

âœ… danger (IN) - havfda
âœ… danger (OUT OF) - havfdan xoli

âœ… date (OUT OF) - eskirgan
âœ… date (UP-TO) - zamonaviy

âœ… day AFTER day - kundan-kunga
âœ… day/date (ON) -â€¦da (kun/sana)

âœ… deal IN sth (ph.v) - olib sotmoq
âœ… deal WITH sth (ph.v)  - ish koÊ»rmoq, munosabatda bo'lmoq

âœ… demand (IN) - bozori chaqqon
âœ… demand (ON) - so'rovga/talabga koÊ»ra

âœ… demand FOR sth -â€¦ni talab qilmoq, â€¦ga talab
âœ… demand FROM sb -â€¦dan talab qilmoq

âœ… depend ON sth - bog'liq boÊ»lmoq
âœ… dependent ON sb/sth - â€¦ga qaram/bog'liq

âœ… describe sth TO sb - â€¦gaâ€¦ni tasvirlamoq
âœ… description OF sth/sb -â€¦ning tasviri

âœ… detail (IN) - atroflicha, har taraflama
âœ… details OF sth - biror narsa haqida ma'lumot

âœ… devoted TO sb/sth -â€¦ga bag'ishlangan

text:
THAN ğŸ†š THEN
âœ… Than - solishtirish ma'nosida 
   Sardor is taller than Aziz.

âœ… Then - vaqtga nisbatan "keyin" degan ma'noni beradi
 Madina ate the dinner, then she watched some TV.

COMPLEMENT ğŸ†š COMPLIMENT
âœ… Complement - nimadir qisman toâ€˜ldirish
  This item is one of the most important complements of cars.

âœ… Compliment - kimgadir yaxshi soâ€˜zlar bilan xushmuomalalik qilish
  Davron made a good copmliment for his girlfriend that she was like a shining sunny.

FEWER ğŸ†š LESS
âœ… Fewer - sanaladigan narsa buyumlarga nisbatan ishlatiladi
   Said has fewer books than Timur.

âœ… Less - sanalmaydigan narsa buyumlar uchun ishlatiladi
   I think less talk makes you uncomparable.

PRINCIPAL ğŸ†š PRINCIPLE
âœ… Principal - bu kishiga yoki guruhga nisbatan yuqori darajani koâ€˜rsatadi
   Mr Akmal is our principal.

âœ… Principle - qonun bilan belgilab qoâ€˜yilgan qoidalarga nisbatan.
   Good looking is one of the principle of our company.

text:
So'zlashuv uchun: Lug'at
âš¡ï¸ Romance and Love Phrases

ğŸ¯ Are you free tomorrow evening?
Ertaga kechki payt bo'shmisiz?

ğŸ¯ I would like to invite you to dinner
Kechki ovqatga taklif qilmoqchiman

ğŸ¯ You look beautiful! (to a woman)
Ko'rinishingiz yaxshi

ğŸ¯ You have a beautiful name
Ismingiz chiroyli ekan

ğŸ¯ Can you tell me more about you?
O'zingiz haqida ko'proq gapirib beraolasizmi?

ğŸ¯ Are you married?
Turmush qurganmisiz?

ğŸ¯ I'm single
Bo'ydoqman (for men) / Turmushga
chiqmaganman (for women)

ğŸ¯ I'm married
Uylanganman (for men), / turmushga
chiqqanman (for women)

ğŸ¯ Can I have your phone number?
Telefon raqamingizni bera olasizmi?

ğŸ¯ Can I have your email?
Elektron manzilingizni bera olasizmi?

ğŸ¯ Do you have any pictures of you?
Rasmingiz bormi?

ğŸ‘‰

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
in/on/at ko'makchilarining boshqa so'zlar bilan ishlatilishi

âœ³ï¸ Sayohat, xizmat safari, dengiz sayohatiga chiqish degan ma'nolarda to be/go fe'llari bilan quyidagi koÊ»makchili birikmalar qoÊ»llaniladi.
âœ… on holiday - ta'tilda (-ga)  
âœ… on business - ish boÊ»yicha/bilan  
âœ… on a trip - safarga 
âœ… on a tour - ekskursiya/turga 
âœ… on a cruise - dengiz sayohatida
ğŸ”¸Did you go to Germany on holiday or on business?
ğŸ”¸Tom is away at the moment. He is on holiday in France.

âš ï¸ Ta'tilga chiqish/ta'tilga ketish birikmasida joy nomi oldin qoÊ»llanilsa, for koÊ»makchisi qoÊ»llanishi lozim.
ğŸ”¸Tom has gone to France for a holiday.

âœ³ï¸ On koÊ»makchisi bilan qoÊ»llaniladigan birikmalarga misollar:
âœ… on television - televizorda 
âœ… on the radio - radioda 
âœ… on the Internet - internetda
âœ… on the phone/telephone - telefonda
âœ… on strike - ish tashlashda
âœ… on a diet - parhezda 
âœ… on fire - yong'in ostida  
âœ… on the whole - umuman 
âœ… on purpose - ataylab, joÊ»rttaga
ğŸ”¸I didn't watch the news on television, I heard it on the radio.
ğŸ”¸You can't phone me. I am not on the phone.
ğŸ”¸I have put on a lot of weight. I will have to go on a diet.
ğŸ”¸Look! That car is on fire!

âœ³ï¸ In koÊ»makchisi bilan qoÊ»llaniladigan birikmalarga misollar:
âœ… in the rain - yomg'irda  
âœ… in the sun(shine) - quyoshda 
âœ… in the shade - soyada
âœ… in the dark - qorong'uda
âœ… in (bad/good) weather - yomon/yaxshi ob-havoda
âœ… in ink - siyohda  
âœ… in biro - sharikli ruchkada  
âœ… in pencil - qalamda
âœ… in words - soÊ»zlar bilan 
âœ… in figures - raqamlar bilan
âœ… in block letters - bosma harflarda 
âœ… in cash - naqd pulda  
âœ… in love - sevishgan 
âœ… in (my) opinion - fikri(m)cha
âœ… in general - umuman
ğŸ”¸We sat in the shade. It was too hot to sit in the sun.

âœ³ï¸ At koÊ»makchisi bilan qoÊ»llaniladigan birikmalarga misollar:
âœ… at a speed ofâ€¦ - ... tezlikda 
âœ… at the age ofâ€¦ - ... yoshida 
âœ… at the temperature ofâ€¦ - ... darajadagi temperaturada
ğŸ”¸The train was travelling at a speed of 120 miles an hour.

ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
messages.text:
Ingliz tilida even so'zining qo'llanishi

1ï¸âƒ£ Ingliz tilida even - hattoki, hatto ma'nosida o'zbek tilida yuklama vazifasiga o'xshash holatlarda ishlatiladi.
ğŸ”¸She has a television in every room of the house, even the bathroom. (hatto yuvinish xonasida ham bor)
ğŸ”¸These pictures are really awful. Even I take better pictures than these.
ğŸ”¸He always wears a coat, even in hot weather.
ğŸ”¸Not even her best friend would help her. (Hatto eng yaqin do'sti ham unga yordam bermaydi)

2ï¸âƒ£ even so'zi fe'l bilan kelganda gap o'rtasida ham kelishi mumkin.
ğŸ”¸Laura has travelled all over the world. She's even been to the Antarctic.
ğŸ”¸They are very rich. They even have their own private jet.

3ï¸âƒ£ Even inkor fe'llar bilan ham ishlatilishi mumkin.
ğŸ”¸I can't cook. I can't even boil an egg.
ğŸ”¸They weren't very friendly to us. They didn't even say hello.

4ï¸âƒ£ Even qiyosiy darajadagi sifat va ravishlar bilan ham qo'llaniladi va '(un)dan ham ertaroq, balandroq...' degan ma'nolarda ishlatiladi.
ğŸ”¸I got up early, but Jack got up even earlier.
ğŸ”¸I knew I didn't have much money, but I have even less than I thought.

5ï¸âƒ£ even though/even when/even if bog'lovchili birikmalaridan keyin gap qo'llash lozim.
ğŸ”¸Even though Tina can't drive, she has a car. 
ğŸ”¸He never shouts, even when he's angry.

âš ï¸ Even so'zi yolg'iz bog'lovchi sifatida ishlatilmaydi, ya'ni undan keyin gap kelmaydi.
ğŸ”¸I can't reach the shelf even if I stand on a chair. (even I stand emas)

âš–ï¸ even if va even so'zlarini qiyoslaymiz.
ğŸ”¸It's dangerous to swim here even if you're a strong swimmer. (even if+gap)
ğŸ”¸The river is dangerous, even for strong swimmers.(even+ot, otli birikma)

âš–ï¸ even if va if bog'lovchilarini qiyoslaymiz:
ğŸ”¸Weâ€™re going to the beach tomorrow. It doesnâ€™t matter what the weather is like. Weâ€™re going even if the weather is bad. (Ob-havo yomon bo'lsa ham, ketamiz)
ğŸ”¸We want to go to the beach tomorrow, but we wonâ€™t go if the weather is bad. (Ob-havo yomon bo'lsa, ketmaymiz)

ğŸ”¸These pictures are really awful. Even I take better pictures than these.
ğŸ”¸He always wears a coat, even in hot weather.
ğŸ”¸Not even her best friend would help her. (Hatto eng yaqin do'sti ham unga yordam bermaydi)

text.text:
Barcha kanal adminlariga!
Abiturientlar tezroq boshqa abiturientlar bilan natijalarini qisman bo'lsada taqqoslashlari uchun bepul

botlarini ishga tushirdik. Lekin hali ko'pchilik abiturientlar bu haqida bilishmaydi yoki yolg'on, xato narsa deb o'ylashadi.
Qancha ko'p abiturient natijasini kiritsa shuncha aniq natijalar chiqadi.
Ushbu ajoyib imkoniyatni barcha abiturientlarga yetkazishda savob evaziga o'z hissangizni qo'shing.

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temur
text:
Phrasal verbs 1
Harakatni ifodalovchi so'z bilan prepositionlar birga kelib, boshqa bir ma'noni anglatishi - phrasal verbs deyiladi.

Go in - Ichkariga kirmoq
Walk in - Yurib kirmoq
Look out - tashqariga qaramoq / ehtiyot bo'l
Get out - transportdan tushmoq
Get on - transportga chiqmoq
Come on - Bo'laqol
Hold on - kutmoq
Carry on - davom etmoq
Go / walk / drive on - yo'lda davom etmoq
Fall off - tushib ketmoq
Take off - ko'tarilmoq
Stand up - turmoq
Go up - balandlamoq
Look up - qaramoq
Wake up - uyg'onmoq
Get up - o'rindan turmoq
Grow up - ulg'aymoq
Speak up - balandroq gapirmoq
Wash up - yuvmoq
Hurry up - shoshilmoq
Give up - harakatdan to'xtamoq.
Sit down - o'tirmoq
Lie down - uyquga yotmoq
Fall down - qulamoq
Slow down - sekinlamoq
Break down - buzilmoq
Run away (yoki off) - yugurib ketmoq
Come back - qaytib kelmoq
Look round - burilib qaramoq
Fall over - yiqilmoq
Climb over - oshib o'tmoq.
She is going away at 5 o'clock and coming back at 10 o'clock - U soat beshda ketib, soat o'nda qaytib kelmoqchi.

text.text: Aniq artikl bilan ishlatiladigan turg'un birikmalar

text:
âœ³ï¸ Quyidagi birikmalar ingliz tilida aniq artikl bilan ishlatiladi:

âœ… all the same - baribir, qaramasdan  
âœ… keep the house - uyni boshqarmoq
âœ… by the time - borib, -guncha
âœ… lay the table - dasturxon yozmoq
âœ… by the way - aytgancha 
âœ… on the contrary - aksincha
âœ… make the bed - yotoqni yig'ishtirmoq
âœ… do the bed - yotoqni tayyorlamoq  
âœ… do the cooking - ovqat tayyorlamoq  
âœ… do the washing up - idishlarni yuvmoq
âœ… on the whole - umuman olganda
âœ… tell the time - vaqtni aytmoq
âœ… tell the truth - haqiqatni aytmoq
âœ… do the shopping - bozor qilmoq
âœ… for the sake of - sharafiga 
âœ… the same - bir xil
âœ… for the time being - hozircha 
âœ… the right side - toÊ»gâ€™ri yoÊ»lda/tarafda
âœ… the wrong side - notoÊ»gâ€™ri yoÊ»lda/tarafda
âœ… under the influence of - taâ€™sirida, taâ€™siri ostida
âœ… under the impression - taassurot ostida
âœ… in the distance - uzoqda 
âœ… in the daytime - kunduzi
âœ… in the end - oxiri, niyohat 
âœ… in the long run - borib-borib, oxirida  
âœ… in the sun - quyoshda
âœ… in the dark - qorongâ€™uda
âœ… in the shade - soyada
âœ… in the rain - yomgâ€™ir ostida
âœ… in the meantime - hozirda
âœ… in the past - oÊ»tmishda
âœ… in the original - o'z tilida 
âœ… on the phone - telefonda
âœ… in the face of - biror sharoitga qaramasdan, natijasida

text.text: the steamer had left the port, we sent a telegram to the buyers
Paroxod portni tark etgach, biz xaridorlarga telegramma yubordik

I was coming here, I met your brother
ğŸ”¹Bu yoqqa kelayotganimda men akangizni uchratdim
you insist on these terms, we shall not be able to come to an agreement with you.
To siz shu shartlarga turib olar ekansiz, biz siz bilan kelisha olmaymiz
U uyiga kelishi bilan (kelgach) bu ishni qiladi.
Sizni men oxirgi marta koâ€˜rganimdan  buyon nima qilayapsiz

Men ishimni tugatmagunimcha (tugatganimcha) shu yerda boâ€˜laman
â–ªï¸
the legal adviser was drawing up the contract, we were discussing the speciï¬cation of the goods.
Yuristimiz shartnomani tuzayotganida biz mollarning xususiyatlarini muhokama qildik.
I have not read the book, I cannot tell you anything about it.

Men kitobni oâ€˜qib chiqmaganim sababli, u haqda biror narsa deyolmayman.
â–ªï¸
Men buni hozir qila olmayman, chunki juda bandman.

he documents have not arrived, we cannot load the goods.
ğŸ”¹Modomiki hujjatlar yetib kelmagan ekan, biz mollarni yuklay olmaymiz.
he was in a great hurry.
U tez yurdi, chunki u juda shoshilardi.
he is ill today, we shall have to postpone the meeting.
Uning kasalligi  tufayli, majlisni qoldirishimizga toâ€˜gâ€˜ri keladi.

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temur
text:
As with any Writing task 1, this is important.  You should not keep repeating the same structures.  The key language when you write about pie charts is proportions and percentages.

Common phrases to see are

text.text: the proportion ofâ€¦ or  the percentage ofâ€¦

text:
80% = four-fifths
75% three-quarters
70% = seven in ten
65% = two-thirds
60% = three-fifths
55% = more than half
50% = half
45% = more than two fifths
40% = two-fifths
35% = more than a third
30% = less than a third
25% = a quarter
20% = a fifth
15% = less than a fifth
10% = one in ten
5% = one in twenty

77% =  just over three quarters
77% = approximately three quarters
49% = just under a half
49% = nearly a half
32% = almost a third

text.text: Percentage proportion / number / amount / majority / minority

text:
75% - 85% = a very large majority
65% - 75% = a significant proportion
10% - 15% = a minority
5% = a very small number

ğŸ”¸The 11.45 train left on time. (poyezd 11.45da ketgan)
ğŸ”¸ Please be on time. Don't be late. (Iltimos, o'z vaqtida keling, kechikmang)
ğŸ”¸The conference was very well-organised. Everything began and finished on time. (Hamma narsa belgilangan vaqtida boshlanib va belgilangan vaqtda tugagan.)

2ï¸âƒ£ in time (for something/to do something) - yetarlicha erta, vaqtida ulgurib degan ma'noda ishlatiladi. Bu yerda aniq vaqt boÊ»lmaydi va kimdir biror ish qilishga ulgurishi asosiy oÊ»rinda turadi.
ğŸ”¸Will you be in time for dinner? (Kechki ovqatga ulgurasanmi?)
ğŸ”¸I must hurry. I want to get home in time to see the football match on television.

âœ… in time iborasining antonimi too late (juda kech) hisoblanadi.
ğŸ”¸I got home too late to watch the game on TV. (Men juda kech bordim - o'yinni ko'rolmadim)

âš ï¸ just in time - zoÊ»rg'a ulgurib birikmasi ishlatilishiga e'tibor bering.
ğŸ”¸A child ran across the road in front of the car, but I managed to stop just in time. (mashinamni vaqtida toÊ»xtatishga zoÊ»rg'a ulgurdim)

âš ï¸in good time - ancha oldin degan ma'noda qoÊ»llaniladi.
ğŸ”¸You must arrive at the airport in good time not to miss your flight.

ğŸ“Œ At the 14th session of UNESCO, which took place on October 5, 1966 in  Paris, in cooperation with the International Labor Organization, â€œRecommendations concerning the status of teachersâ€ were adopted.

 ğŸŒ The document establishes international norms on the rights and obligations of teachers, the most important conditions that must be created for teachers.

ğŸ—“ In this regard, this date has been widely celebrated since 1994 as International Teachers Day.

ğŸ“ This day is widely celebrated in more than 100 countries, and reminds of the role and importance of teachers in the life of people and the world development of mankind, the need to focus on improving their working conditions and protecting their rights.

ğŸ”– "Parenthetical words and phrases" - "Qo'shimcha so'zlar va iboralar"

ğŸ’  As far as I know - Bilishimcha
ğŸ’  Perfect - Juda zoâ€™r

ğŸ’  Cheers - Oldik (qadah soâ€™zi)

ğŸ’  Frankly speaking - Ochiqchasiga aytganda
ğŸ’  To cut it short - Qisqa qilib aytganda
ğŸ’  So to speak - Deylik
ğŸ’  Meanwhile - Vaqtida, paytida
ğŸ’  By the way - Aytgancha
ğŸ’  It goes without saying - O'z - o'zidan ma'lum
ğŸ’  Indeed - Rostdan ham
ğŸ’  In other words - ya'ni

ğŸ’  Besides - Bundan tashqari

ğŸ’  Ğ¡ertainly - Albatta
ğŸ’  Anyway - Har qanday holatda ham
ğŸ’  Always at all - Umuman

âœ³ï¸ Today's reading passage is about
who was a South African anti-apartheid revolutionary, political leader, and philanthropist who served as

from 1994 to 1999. 

     After twenty-seven years in prison, Nelson Mandela was elected president of his country. His primary goal was to convince blacks and whites of the power and wisdom of

was not only perfectly legal in South Africa, it was the law!
     Black people were not allowed to vote, go to the same schools, shop in the same stores, or live in the same areas as white people. The system was called

, and people were jailed if they spoke out against it.
     Mandela was one of many people who fought against apartheid. At first, as a young lawyer, he tried to combat it through the legal system. But he got so angry with the
of black people that he started urging them to fight back - to meet

with violence.
     As a result of his actions, he was arrested and sentenced to prison for life. Even in prison, because he was black, he got worse

than the white prisoners - poor food, hard labor such as breaking rocks in the hot sun, and only one letter or visitor every six months.
     Nelson Mandela spent twenty-seven years in those terrible conditions.
, the world outside South Africa became more

, and more opposed to, apartheid. 
     Around the globe, people and governments demanded justice, including freedom for Mandela.
     Finally, the South African government gave in - they agreed to end apartheid, have an election where everyone could vote, and let Nelson Mandela go free.
     Over the years, Nelson Mandela had become a symbol of the fight against oppression. 
Most people expected him to come out of prison angrier than ever; they thought he would call on black people

.
     But Mandela had spent all those years thinking about everything he had seen, and he had changed his mind about fighting and hating. He wanted to find a way to work together with whites, to build a â€œrainbow nationâ€ where every person would be equal, like the colors in a rainbow.
     In the first free election in South Africa, Mandela was elected president. He worked to get black and white people to forgive each other for bad things they had done in the past.

text.text: â€œIf you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy,â€ he said. â€œThen he becomes your partner.â€

text:
Nelson Mandela was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1993. The man who had lost so much had taught his nation, and the world, the importance and power of forgiveness.

was not only perfectly legal in South Africa, it was the law!

of black people that he started urging them to fight back - to meet

than the white prisoners - poor food, hard labor such as breaking rocks in the hot sun, and only one letter or visitor every six months.

, the world outside South Africa became more

, and more opposed to, apartheid.

Most people expected him to come out of prison angrier than ever; they thought he would call on black people

.

â€œIf you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy,â€ he said. â€œThen he becomes your partner.â€

text:
MOST 10 COMMON COLLACATIONS WITH THE VERB â€œCOMEâ€ ğŸ“•ğŸ“•ğŸ“•ğŸ“•ğŸ“•

1. Come close â€“ to almost do something.
(Yaqin kelmoq)

We didnâ€™t win, but we came close to win.
(Biz gâ€™alaba qozona olmadik, ammo gâ€™alabaga juda yaqin kelgandik.)


2. Come first â€“ to be more important than something else
(Hammasidan ustun boâ€™lmoq)

He cares about his job, but his family comes first.
(U oâ€™z ishi haqida juda koâ€™p oâ€™ylaydi, lekin u uchun uning oilasi hammasidan ustun turadi.)


3. Come to a stop â€“ If an activity comes to a stop, it stops happening.
(Toâ€™xtab qolmoq)

Working on this project has come to a stop because of a lack of funding.
(Loyiha ustida ish mablagâ€™ yetishmovchiligi bois toâ€™xtab qoldi.)


4.  Come up with â€“ to think of an idea, answer etc.
(Oâ€™ylab topmoq)

We have been asked to come up with some new ideas.
(Bizdan yangi fikrlar oâ€™ylab topishimizn soâ€™rashdi.)


5.  Come cheap â€“ to be available at a low price
(Arzonga sotilmoq)

These smartphones donâ€™t come cheap.
(Bu telefonlarni arzonga olib boâ€™lmaydi.)


6.  Come to a compromise â€“ a way of ending problem
(Kelishuvga erishmoq)

Both sides have agreed to meet in the hope of coming to a compromise.
(Ikki taraf kelishib olish maqsadida uchrashishga koâ€™nishdi.)


7.  Come to rescue â€“ to save someone who is having problems or difficulties
(Qiyin vaziyatda yordamlashmoq)

Carolâ€™s brother came to the rescue and sent her 1000$.
(Carolning akasi unga yordam berdi va 1000$ joâ€™natdi.)


8.  Come on time â€“ to arrive at the exact time 
(Ayni vaqtda yetib kelmoq)

John always tries to come on time.
(John har doim ayni vaqtda yetib kelishga harakat qiladi.)


9.  Come clean â€“ be completely honest
(Rostgoâ€™y boâ€™lmoq)

My friend Ann doesnâ€™t always come clean.
(Doâ€™stim Anna har doim  ham rost gapiravermaydi.)


10.  Come to life -  If something such as machine comes to life, it starts to work. 
(Ishga tushmoq)

Sometimes my TV doesnâ€™t come to life.
(Baâ€™zida mening televizorim ishlamay qoladi)

text.text:
â€‹â€‹Selena Gomez - Love You Like A Love Song

It's been said and done
Every beautiful thought's been already sung
And I guess right now, here's another one
So your melody will play on and on, with the best of â€˜em
You are beautiful, like a dream come alive, incredible
A center full of miracle, lyrical, you saved my life again
And I want you to know, baby

I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
And I keep hitting re-pe-pe-pe-peat
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
And I keep hitting re-pe-pe-pe-peat

Constantly, boy you play through my mind like a symphony
There's no way to describe what you do to me
You just do to me what you do and it feels like I've been rescued
I've been set free, I am hypnotized by your destiny
You are magical, lyrical, beautiful, you are
And I want you to know, baby

I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
And I keep hitting re-pe-pe-pe-peat
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
And I keep hitting re-pe-pe-pe-peat

No one compares, you stand alone
To every record I own, music to my heart
That's what you are, a song that goes on and on

I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
And I keep hitting re-pe-pe-pe-peat
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I love you, like a love song

text:
âœ…Vocabulary time

Relationship ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘§

ğŸ”¸ get on with somebody - have a good relationship

ğŸ”¸ look up to somebody - respect somebody

ğŸ”¸ be in touch with somebody - be in communication with somebody

ğŸ”¸ fall out with somebody - argue and stop being friendly with somebody

ğŸ”¸ grow apart from somebody - gradually have a less close relationship with somebody

ğŸ”¸ take after somebody - resemble somebody in your family [in appearance or personality]

ğŸ”¸ grow up together/with somebody - have many childhood and adolescent experiences in common with somebody

ğŸ”¸ be close to somebody - know somebody well and see or talk to them often

ğŸ”¸ take after somebody - resemble somebody in your family [in appearance or personality]

ğŸ”¸ grow up together/with somebody - have many childhood and adolescent experiences in common with somebody

ğŸ”¸ be close to somebody - know somebody well and see or talk to them often

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temur Sobirov
text:
Once there was a farmer who realized that he had lost his watch in the barn. It was not an ordinary watch because he had some sentimental values attached to it. And we all know when it comes to sentiments, human become more serious. After searching high and low among the hay for a long while; he gave up and thought of taking help from a group of children, who were playing outside. The children hurried inside the barn, went through and around the entire stack of hay but still could not find the watch.                         

Just when the farmer was about to give up, a little boy came  to him and asked to give him another chance. The farmer agreed and sent the little boy back into the barn alone. After a while the boy came out with the watch in his hand!

The farmer was both happy and surprised and so he asked the boy how he succeeded where the rest had failed. The boy replied, â€œI did nothing but sit on the ground and listen. In silence, I heard the ticking of the watch and just looked  for it in that direction.â€ hence a peaceful mind can think better than a worked up and preoccupied mind.

ğŸ”¸ attach - biriktirmoq
ğŸ”¸ sentiment - his, fikr
ğŸ”¸ among - orasida
ğŸ”¸ hay - hashak

ğŸ”¸ entire - butun
ğŸ”¸ stack - gâ€˜aram, toâ€˜p
ğŸ”¸ succeed - muvaffaqiyatli kechmoq

ğŸ”¸ fail - yiqilmoq; magâ€˜lub boâ€˜lmoq
ğŸ”¸ silence - sukunat 
ğŸ”¸ ticking - chiqillash

ğŸ”¸ hence - demak, binobarin
ğŸ”¸ peaceful - tinch
ğŸ”¸ mind - aql, fikr, es-hush
ğŸ”¸ preoccupied - tashvishli

Ushbu imtiyozli kredit kam foizlarda beriladi. Talaba oÊ»qishni bitirib, ishga joylashgach, oyligidan kreditni toÊ»lashi mumkin boÊ»ladi.

Bundan avvalroq, ikki va undan ortiq farzandi to'lov-kontrakt asosida o'qiydigan oilalar uchun yengillik berishni ko'zda tutuvchi loyiha tayyorlanayotgani haqida

ğŸ”¸ Does anybody here speak Russian? â€“ Bu yerda kimdir rus tilida gapirmadimi? 
ğŸ”¸ I don't speak English very well â€” Men ingliz tilida uncha yaxshi gapira olmayman
ğŸ”¸ I speak English a little bit. â€“ Men ingliz tilida biroz gaplasha olaman!

Do'stlaringizga ham ulashingâœ…

text:
âœ… Writing time

Emphasis, addition or examples

ğŸ”¹ï¸To illustrate- Namuna qilish uchun
ğŸ”¹ï¸To clarify- Oydinlik kiritish uchun
ğŸ”¹ï¸Further (not â€˜furthermoreâ€™)- qo'shimcha, yana
ğŸ”¹ï¸First, second and third (not firstly, secondly and thirdly)- birinchidan, ikkinchidan, uchinchidan
ğŸ”¹ï¸For instance- Misol uchun
ğŸ”¹ï¸Moreover-Bundan tashqari
ğŸ”¹ï¸Typically- o'zi, odatda
ğŸ”¹ï¸Especially- Ayniqsa
ğŸ”¹ï¸In fact- Haqiqatdan
ğŸ”¹ï¸Namely- Ya'ni
ğŸ”¹ï¸In addition- qo'shimcha qilib aytsak

ğŸ”±Concluding

ğŸ”¸ï¸To summarise- Xulosa qilganda
ğŸ”¸ï¸It can be concluded that- Shunday deb tugatsak bo'ladi
ğŸ”¸ï¸As can be seen- Bundan ko'rinib turibdiki
ğŸ”¸ï¸Ultimately- Yakuniy xulosada
ğŸ”¸ï¸Given the above- yuqoridagilardan xulosa qilib aytsak
ğŸ”¸ï¸Finally- Shunday qilib

text:
âœ…Vocabulary time

ğŸ’  Relationships

1ï¸âƒ£ get on with somebody - have a good relationship

2ï¸âƒ£ look up to somebody - respect somebody

3ï¸âƒ£ be in touch with somebody - be in communication with somebody
 
4ï¸âƒ£ fall out with somebody - argue and stop being friendly with somebody

5ï¸âƒ£ grow apart from somebody - gradually have a less close relationship with somebody

6ï¸âƒ£ take after somebody - resemble somebody in your family [in appearance or personality]

7ï¸âƒ£ grow up together/with somebody - have many childhood and adolescent experiences in common with somebody

8ï¸âƒ£ be close to somebody - know somebody well and see or talk to them often

ğŸš© Muloqot uchun yangi so'zlar to'plami
 
1.  I didnâ€™t mean to - Men xohlamagandim
2.  It was an accident - Bu tasodifan bo'lib qoldi
3.  It doesn't matter - Buni farqi yo'q
4.  Itâ€™s all so complicated - Hammasi shunchalik chalkash
5.  You make me mad - Sen meni aqldan ozdirasan
6.  Talk to you later - Keyinroq gaplashamiz
7.  Are you still here? - Haliyam shu yerdamisiz?
8.  Until we meet again - Yana ko'rishguncha
9.  It's early (yet) - Hali vaqtli
10.  No, thanks - Yo'q, rahmat
11.  No way! - Hech ham!
12.  I'm (so) sorry! - Kechirasiz!
13.  I'm sorry, I can't - Kechirasiz men qila olmayman
14.  One minute, please - Bir daqiqa, iltimos
15.  What a good chance! - Qanday yaxshi imkoniyat!

text:
Most commonly used phrases for speaking ğŸ—£ğŸ‘¥

1.  How is it going?  - Ishlaring qanday?

2.  Long time no see! -  Anchadan beri koâ€™rishmadik!

3.  What have you been up to? - Nimalar qilib yuribsan?

4.  Canâ€™t complain.  Hamma ishlarim joyida. 

5.  How do you know? Qayerdan bilasan?

6.  Thatâ€™s a good one. Zoâ€™r hazil. 

7.  It is very kind of you.  Yordamingiz uchun rahmat. 

8.  Thank you anyway.  Nima boâ€™lganda ham rahmat. 

9.  Thank you in advance. Oldindan rahmat. 

10.  No worries! Tashvishlanmang.  

11.  Whatâ€™s going on? Bu yerda nima boâ€™lyapti?

12.  Did I get you right? Sizni toâ€™gâ€™ri tushundimmi?

13.  Donâ€™t take it to heart.  Koâ€™nglingga yaqin olma.

14.  I didnâ€™t catch the last word.  Oxirgi soâ€™zizni eshitmay qoldim.

15.  Sorry, I wasnâ€™t listening. Uzr, sizni tinglamayotgan edim.

16.  It doesnâ€™t matter.  Farqi yoâ€™q.
 
17.  Fingers crossed.  Omad!

18.  Oh, that. That explains it.  Ha, tushundim.

19.  Things happen. Boâ€™lib turadi. 

20.  Sorry to bother you. Uzr, bezovta qilgan boâ€™lsam. 

21.  Iâ€™ll be with you in a minute.  Bir daqiqa! 

22.  Where were you? Biz nima deyayotgan edik?

23.  You were saying? Nima deyayotgan edingiz?

24.  Lucky you! Qanchalar omadlisiza!

25.  I freaked out! Juda jahlim chiqdi! 

26.  Good for you! Omadingiz keldi! 

27.  Youâ€™ve got to be kidding me! Hazillashayotgan boâ€™lsangiz kerak!

28.  Cheer up! Kayfiyatingni koâ€™tar!

29.  Come on, you can do it! Qani, sen buni eplaysan!

30.  Keep up the good work! Yaxshi ishlashda davom eting. 

31.  Thatâ€™s lit! Zoâ€™rku!

32.  There you go! Aytgandimku! 

33.  Not a bit. Umuman unday emas!

34.  There is no room for doubt. Shubhaga oâ€™rin yoâ€™q. 

35.  Iâ€™ll text you! Sizga xabar joâ€™nataman.
